1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi d+hA ra nA ma d+ha ra Ni maN+Dal 
1b2(rgyud 'grel): pra kri ya ya thA kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa 
1b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lag len gau rims ji lta ba zhes bya ba
1b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): ngam 'gro ba gzhan gyi gdon dang nad rnams las grol bar 'dod pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi 
2a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa pos/ phyugs lhas sam/ shing gcig dang lha khang ngam/ lam gyi gzhi mdo'am 
2a3(rgyud 'grel): khing stong ngam/ nags tshal gang yang rung bar bsam gtan gyi khang par chag chag dang ba'i 
2a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam lnga dang / spos dri zhim pos byug ris byas la/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa thams cad rdzogs par
2a5(rgyud 'grel): bshams nas/ khrus dang 'thor 'thung dang nyi reg byas te/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs gtsang 
2a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing sar pagon la/ phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis mchod pa byin gyis brlabs la/ yungs kar lag 
2b1(rgyud 'grel): thogs te/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nas bin+d+ha bin+d+ha badz+ra hU paT ces pa'i bar du lan gsum mam bcu brjod do// de nas bum pa bca' ste/ gser dang dngul lam ma rnyed na zangs sems las byas 
2b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang rung ste/ lto ba che la mgrin pa ring ba zhabs zhum pa kha g.yel ba/ nag pe ra ri med pa/ grangs lha grangs dang mthun pa drug gam/ yang na bdun nam gcig kyang rung ste/ gu gul gyis bdugs 
2b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / yungs kar gyis bgegs bzlog la/ der 'o ma dang chu nyung zad blug pa der rin po che rnams dang / dri lnga dang / sman lnga dang 'bra lngas dgang la mgrin pa gos kyi shing las byung ba'i kha tshar 
2b4(rgyud 'grel): bun tshar ma nyams pa'i mthing shun gyis kha bsgyur ba'am/ dkar po gser zhing gtsang bas mgul pa bcings la/ me tog sngon po dang bcas pas kha brgyan la mgul pa ras kyi steng du yungs
2b5(rgyud 'grel): kar dang / rtswa dur ba nyag ma bdun dang bcas pa dri zhim pa'i me tog phreng ba bcings la/ mdud pa la hUM bris pa'i ba'i lci ba sa la ma ljang bas so// gdugs dang ba dan kyang ngo // de nas maN+Dal 
2b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi steng du bzhag go/ yang khrus dang 'thor 'thung nye reg byas la/ las kyi rdo rje dang / gsang gdub dang / gdub bu'i cho ga rnams byas la/ der rang gi snying gar nyi ma las sa bon ltas pa des 
2b7(rgyud 'grel): rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas pa dmigs la/ bde bar gshegs pa dam pa'i chos// tshogs chen bcas la phyag 'tshal lo// gtum po phyag na rdo rje la// khyad par du yang phyag 'tshal lo// 
2b8(rgyud 'grel): ying 'or mchod rdzas ji snyed rnams// rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas la dbul// 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas// da lta sdig pa bgyis pa dang // bgyid du brtsal dang yi rang ba// shin tu 
3a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyod pas bshags shing sdom// bdag dang gzhan gyis gang bgyis pa'i// dge ba kun la rjes yi rang // byang chub snying por nyer gnas te// gang yang byang chub 
3a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog rtog pa'i// bdag gis gsol ba rgyal ba kun// 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol// bya ba thams cad byas nas ni// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' ba rnams// bdag gis 
3a3(rgyud 'grel): gsol bas rgyal ba kun// sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' gsol// phyag 'tshal la sogs bsod nams gang // ji snyed bdag gis bgyis pa rnams// ji ltar mgon pos mkhyen pa 
3a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar// byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo'o// de nas ram gyis rang ma rtogs pa stong par bsam// a ser pos gser gyis gzhir bsam// de'i steng du ba ma las 'o ma can gyi rgya ma 
3a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de nas sum las ri rab de'i steng du brum las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rta babs dang bcas pa/ dbus dang mtshams bzhir 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dang phyogs bzhi ni gri gug 
3a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhis mtshan pa'o// de'i dbus su ram las stong par song ba'i dang las chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'i sgra byung bar bsam/ oM dz+wA la nA ya swAhA/ de las sna tshogs rdo rje ngos gcig med pa 
3a7(rgyud 'grel): de las rdo rje rnams 'joms kyi skur grub/ sku yongs su rdzogs pa ni su mdog ljang sngon yid tsam khro ba g.yas ni rdo rje n+ya gram la ngos gcig med bathugs kar 'dzin pa/ g.yon dkur brten cing 
3a8(rgyud 'grel): 'byeng ba/ mthal rgyan dang bung rkyen la sags pa dang ldan pa/ stong galegs daril snga ga yogs cig gu can marnams par// an dran nga d+ha ki ma kI li swAH/ maHsa yangs la badz+rags 
3b1(rgyud 'grel): kA la la s+yAH/ at+ta r+ya t+na badz+rA d+hAr yu saH/ oM prata zla Sh+Ta badz+ra pradz+nyA r+thar ya swAn+ta/ zhes pa las/ dbang ldan dang me dang san pa dA rlu rnams kyi 'kha ma' snang dug rnams bzhin du 
3b2(rgyud 'grel): gdengs pa dang / rdo rje ka na ka dang / rdo rjeb can dang / rdo rje tho ba rnams so// de rnams la go rims bzhin du rdo rje gad+ham mo dang / rdo rje ke l-i k+ko lI dang / rdo rje ba tsun dang / rdorjethu ba rnams kyi skur sa 
3b3(rgyud 'grel): po// khro ba rdo rje gtum po srag nag bzhin khro gnyer can/ g.yas pa khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyur te thogs pa// lha thams cad g.yon bstan nas 'gying ba'o// rdo rje ki li kI la ya mdog ljang nag khro gnyer 
3b4(rgyud 'grel): na// g.yas na rdo gcig pa// rdo rje btson mthaM na ga zhog nyer can// swer ser po can/ galas na btson gyi rtse mardo rjes man pa/ rdorje thob sa dag nag pa shin tu rtsub mcha ba gtsigs 
3b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ g.yas na rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'o// de nas mchod yon lag tu thogs te/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs khro rgyal rnams// bdag la mchod yon pazhes nas kyang // 
3b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol// oM a ha ra sarba bi d+ha d+ha ra swAt+ma/ zhes pas mchod yon gyis spyan drangs la rang la bstims la/ phyag rgya gsum gyis rgyas gdab ste/ gong ma'i sngags 
3b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga brjod cing lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bkug la phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo 'dzub mo'i drung du cung zad byung bar byas la/ gung mo gshebs pa'i phyi rol nas 
3b8(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas la/ mthe bong gnyis gshibs pa ni rdo rje rnal 'joms kyi'o// g.yon po ni bsdigs mdzub snying gar bzhag pa/ g.yas 
4a1(rgyud 'grel): sor mo gsum bsgreng la mthe chung gis sen mo mtheb mos mnan pa'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur nang du bcings la/ cung zad bsnol ba'i tshul du bcug ste/ mthe bong gnyis gyen du 
4a2(rgyud 'grel): gshibs la bsgreng ngo // lag po thal mo phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba las/ mthe bong gnyis bsgreng te tshogs bar pa bkug nas srin lag gi drung du gzugs so// lag pa gnyis khu tshur 
4a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings te mthe bong gnyis bsgrengs te mthe'u chung gnyis nang du gzhugs phyag rgya chen po rnams gong ma bzhin bsgoms pas rgyas gdab/ de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/ de nas bru ma las rin po che'i 
4a4(rgyud 'grel): bum pa la nang 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho las pad+ma 'khrungs par bsams laM/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba ro de'i steng du sngags lngas lha lnga bskyed la ye shes kyi lha rnams mchod yon gyis spyan drangs pa bstims 
4a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya gsum gyis rgyas btab nas mchod bstod byas la/ bum pa'i steng du bzhag la/ de la gzungs thag brtags la/ rang dang lha'i thugs kar sngar gyi sngags lnga po gang bzlos pa gsal bar 
4a6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs la/ phreng ba snyim par bcug la gzungs thag nas bzung la/ oM badz+ra a tsin+d+rA ye swAhA/ zhes brjod la phreng ba lag pa g.yas pas bzung la so so'i sngags bzlas pas yi ge phreng ba 
4a7(rgyud 'grel): gzungs thag la 'khril nas ye shes sems dpa' mnyes shing bum par ye shes kyi chu rgyun gyis khengs par bsam/ thun rel glal dang spring pa gsang sbubs la sogs pa spangs lam yengs par 
4a8(rgyud 'grel): 'jab du dbul lo// glal la sogs byung na khrus sogs byas la bzlas pa basbyar yang na kun la thun mong du yang snying thun re la brgya rtsa brkyang dam ji ltar nus pa dbul/ de nas mchod pastod byas 
4b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ phyi rol du dpung bzangs las 'byung ba bzhin gtor ma btang la/ lus ngag gi kun spyod bya/ thun gnyis phan chod rang khrus sogs byas la mchod pastod bzlas pa bya'o// thun tha mal mchod bstod gtor ma 
4b2(rgyud 'grel): btang ba'i rjes la bzod par gsol la/ slar yang bdag la nges par ni// rjes su bzung bar mdzad nas kyang // mgon po rig dang sngags bcas pas// ci bde bar ni gshegs su gsol// zhes 
4b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi ye shes pa gshegs su gsol// khro bo bzhi po rang la bsdu// rang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bsgyur la nyal// yang tho rangs khrus dang mthor 'thung nye reg dang las kyi rdo rje chog nas bzung la thams cad 
4b4(rgyud 'grel): sngar bzhin byas la/ me long gi ngos ltar mnyam pa la rnam lnga dang dri zhim pos byugs la sa bzung bya'o// de nas khrus dang 'thor 'thung nye reg byas la/ sa gzung nyi ma nas brtsams te// slob ma dkyil 'khor 
4b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug gi bar// slob dpon rtogs par 'jug par bya// dri dang bcas pa'i zas bza' zhing // zhes gsungs pas/ bsnyung ba la gnas pa'am/ yang dkar gsum la dris bsgos pa cung zad tsam bza'o// 
4b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus sam nub phyogs su ku sha'i stan la 'dug ste/ lha drug gis sgo nas rang lha lngar bskyed cing ye shes bcug nas rgya gsum gyis btab pa la/ shar phyogs nas slob ma'am yon gyi bdag 
4b7(rgyud 'grel): pos khrus la sogs pa byas nas gos gtsang zhing gsar pa gon la me tog gi phreng ba dri zhim pos bsgos pa lag tu thogs la cog pur 'dug ste/ mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya// mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ 
4b8(rgyud 'grel): srog chags 'byung po thams cad kyi// mi zad pa yind rnams kyang // de dag thams cad zhi bar blta// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// de bas rdo rje rigs mchog/ 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): gi rnam 'joms dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// zhes dang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pas lan gsum gsol ba gdab bo// de nas sngags 'chang 'greng ste/ rang gi lha'i 'khor lo nam mkha' la bteg la/ 
5a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgyur la/ mig la hUM bkod la nyi zla 'bar bar bya zhing / rkang pa gnyis su hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje kha gyes par bsams la// se gol gyi sgra brdabs shing khro bo'i lta bas phyogs mtshams
5a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad blta zhing rdo rje la ro gsum du gsor la/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs rje can gyi thabs chen de// zhi yang sems can gdul don du// dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur// bcom ldan bdud 
5a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags rings brjod// de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu stod bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rnam pa la smad zur gsum par 'dug pa la/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya nas/ kro d+ha kro d+ha 
5a5(rgyud 'grel): ki li kI la ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad dam ma nus na lan gsum btab la/ dbus dang mtshams bzhir gdab/ cod pan dang tsan dan dmar pos thig le gsum dang gu 
5a6(rgyud 'grel): gul dang / yungs kar dang / dri sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa lnga dang / dbu'i gtsug tor rnams rdzogs par bya'o// de nas brtan ma lhag gnas bya ste/ g.yas pa'i srin lag gis haM gis bkug la/ dri sngon du song ba'i 
5a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam lngas mchod la/ spos thogs la/ skyob pa sangs rgyas la sogs kyis// mkhyen pa gsol ba lan gsum bya// de nas lha lnga'i sa dang / phyogs skyong gi gnas su dri'i thig le dang / me tog gi tshom bu byas 
5a8(rgyud 'grel): la lha ldanam mkha' nas phab la bzhugs su gsol/ phyogs skyong rnams yid tsam mam/ yang na ri rgyal gnya' shing 'dzin gyi tshul lto nas// phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba bzhugs su 'tshal// bstan pa rgyas 
5b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i slad du spyan 'dren na// log 'dren gzhom pa'i slad du 'dir gshegs shig/ e h+ye hi da sha lo ka sa pa ri bA ra sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod do// de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bstod pa kun gyis
5b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang brjod la/ bum pa ma tshang ba 'dir bca' zhing bum pa la mchod la brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu snga ma bzhin du bzlas so// yon bdag dang slob ma yang khrus la sogs byed du bcug la/ gsum la 
5b3(rgyud 'grel): skyabs 'gro sbyin/ gtor ma btang la pus mo g.yas pa btsugs lag dril bu bsil shing rdo rje spos thogs la/ rdo rje rnam 'joms bcom ldan 'das// rigs sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// rigs rgyal
5b4(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i tshogs rnams dang // gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba mthu chen rnams// ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol// rdo rje rnam 'joms dkyil 'khor ni// 'gro ba'i sdug/ 
5b5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// yo byad ci 'byor pas 'brin// khyod kyis snang ba mdzad pa dang // las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes lan gsum brjod/ nyi ma 
5b6(rgyud 'grel): 'char kha sngags 'chang g.yog dang bcas pa thig ji lta ba bzhin sgrubs la/ ye shes kyi thig dang las kyi thig dang / kun la slob dpon kha nub tu lta ba lhag ma'o// seng ldeng gi phur bus dbus su btab la/ 
5b7(rgyud 'grel): srad bu bstod pas bskor phyogs su/ rnam 'joms kyi gnas cha chen gcig la bskor/ mu khyud cha bran lnga pa bskor/ de nas lha rnams la thug pa la 'khor lo'i mu khyud che bran gnyis bskor/ de nas phyi
5b8(rgyud 'grel): rol rdo rje ra ba dang / me ri rta babs kyi phyi rol tu cha bran gnyis gnyis la bskor/ de nas 'grus thig btab la 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thig btab/ phyogs bzhir gri gug re bya/ de nas tshon bsgrubs la/ phyogs 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): tshod la shang dkar/ g+ho s+yed/ nub dmar/ byang ldang / dbus mthing / 'khor lo ba'i dang migag sngos/ pad+ma rAg dang por tho// de'i phyi rol ltung / de'i phyi rol dumar/ de'i phyi rol ser/ kun 
6a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyi rol dkar po// de nas 'khor lo'i dbus dang 'dab mi rnams la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bris ste/ dbus rdo rje zla gram ljang sngon la ngos gcig med pabri/ brang shar gyi rtsi bsal rdo rdo rje lnga pa smug 
6a3(rgyud 'grel): nag/ shar lho'i rtsibs la rdo rje rtse gcig pa ljang dag/ lho nub kyi rtsi bsal be con mthing nag/ nub byang gi rtsibs la tho ba nag po bri 'khor lo'i mu khyud dkar po la/ gru chad ljang gul bum pa bri/ lha'i snum 
6a4(rgyud 'grel): bur phyogs skyong dgod/ de yang gsang ba'i spyi rgyud las// brgya byin gyi ni rdo rjer gsungs// me lha'i phyag mtshan me zab yin// gshin rje yi nr-i bai tsin te// bden bral gyi ni ral gri ste// chu bdag gi ni 
6a5(rgyud 'grel): zhags par bya// rlung lha'i phyag mtshan rgyal mtshan bsnams// ku be ra yis dbyug sngon no// dbang phyug gi ni dzaM shul// sa yi lha mo bum pa'o// nyi zla'i b+hag mtshan de nyid do// de rnams gdan byas pa'i 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): steng du dgod par bya'o// de nas sgo bzhir nub kyi sgor dpal be'u dang 'khor lo// byung gi sgor gdugs dang rgyal mtshan// shar gyi sgor pad+ma dang bum pa/ lho'i sgor dung dang nyi bri// de nas rta babasal 
6a7(rgyud 'grel): srogs rdzogs par ro// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas pa'i rnam lnga dang dri zhim posan+de bar blugs la// bla re dang rgyal martan dang / ba dan dang / wA ba ldab kyis dkyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyan 
6a8(rgyud 'grel): cing / me tog sil ma gtor zhing mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad bshams la dra pur bres la/ de nas sngags 'chang bdag nyid khrus la sogs pa thams cad la/ rub skor rtswa kra sha'i stan 
6b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dug la/ las kyi rdo rje'i cho ga dang gsang gdub dang gdu bu'i cho ga rnams byas la maN+Dal blang la mtshan ma dang sta gon gyi lha bsres la/ me tog sngon po'i phreng ba thogs la rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing 
6b2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra dz+wa la na ya AH/ zhes brjod cing lan gasnalags po bskor ba byas la/ me tog de rjenam 'joms kyi dbul phra lA/ skar rang gi mgol bcings la/ nub skor 'greng la khro bo'i bstod pa btangs 
6b3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs gang la la zhig sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ dngos grub kyi bar chad rtsom pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po drag pos/ rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba 'dis mgo bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas 
6b4(rgyud 'grel): so zhes brjod cing / a mo g+ha badz+ra/ e h+ye badz+ra/ zhes pa nas/ badz+ra rA ga dz+wa la ya swAhA'i bar du lan cig brjod pas mtshams bcad/ de nas sngags 'chang nub sgor ku sha'i gdan nyid la bsdad la/ 
6b5(rgyud 'grel): dril bu bsil zhing spos snod thogs la/ ye shes bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od// mngag 'ad pa'i bdud 'ams thams cad bsregs/ zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms// log 'dren 
6b6(rgyud 'grel): sprin po ma lus gdul ba yi// dpa' bo dpa' mtshan stag lpags rlon pa gsol// reg pa'i rgyal po khro ba bzhugs gsol 'tshal// log 'dren 'joms pa'i slad du spyar 'dren gyis// 'gro ba'i don 
6b7(rgyud 'grel): sa gsas gas// nga d+hA sa pa shA 
6b8(rgyud 'grel): s+thi ra badz+ra/ pra ti sI ra badz+ra/ mahA badz+ra/ a pa ti hata badz+ra/ zhes pas bzhugs su gsol// de nas dam tshig chen po de'i phyag rgya bstan te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong mthe'u chung man la 
7a1(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul du bsgreng ba'o// oM shaM ka re ma hA sa ma ye swAhA zhes brjod pa ni dam tshig chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas phyag rgya gsum gyis gdag
7a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas bum pa sngar bzhin bzlas la gzhug/ dam tshi gI gso' ste lag pa gnyis rgyab tu thal mo sbyar ba'i tshul du byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis so sor 'khyud la lte ba'i thad kar 
7a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la/ oM badz+rod b+ha ba ya swAhA/ zhes brjod pa rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig bskar zhing gso ba'o// sku khrus gsol/ mchod yon phul/ dri sngon du 'gro ba rnam lnga dbul/ 'dod yon dang 
7a4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che sna bdun dang / 'phra mchod dbul/ de nas bstod de/ chos nyid stong pa gnyis med ngang nyid las// 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spong ste// thabs la mkhas pa 'jigs 
7a5(rgyud 'grel): byed sur ston pa// khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // sku yi tsha lugs za byed rngam stabs can// gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong lder 
7a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgra/ ma lus dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal bstod// lha yi ye shes rol pas rab ston cing // bsdigs pa'i mtshon cha mang po phyag na bsnams// nyon mongs drag chen sna tshogs 
7a7(rgyud 'grel): 'joms mdzad pa// dug sbrul rgyan gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM gtum chen 'ab rab bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// khro gnyer klog stong 'od zer 'gyu ba bzhin// rngam pa'i nga ro/ 
7a8(rgyud 'grel): 'brug stong bzhin du sgrogs// khro rgyal bgog tshogs 'dul la phyag 'tsha lta bstod// bskal pa ma ltar 'bar ba'i glong dkyil nas// dpa' bo'i stangs stabs brkyang bskum tshul du 
7b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdang mig gis// bgegs dpung bsreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas dpung bzangs nas 'byung ba bzhin// shwar phyogs rdo rje can de lha 
7b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bcas// zhes bya ba lo sogs pa dang / dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha zhes pa la sogs kyis phyogs skyong la gtor ma dang bstod pa bya/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas la
7b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyis 'byung po'i gtor ma btang // de nas gang zag de khrus dang 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byed du bcug la gos gtsang mgon du bcug/ dkyil 'khor dang sngags 'chang gnyis la 
7b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag byed/ drug la/ lag tu me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pas/ rigs sngags 'chang chen dgongs su gsol// bdag ni sdug bsngal las thar phyir// rdo rje 'dzin de 'khor bcas la// 
7b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni gus par skyabs su mchi// zhes lan gsum du brjod do// de nas sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor gyi lhal bstod par bya ste/ ji ltar sngon che ba de gshegs pho brang du// gdug
7b6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dul phyir rdo rje can gyis ni// rjes mthun phrin las khyad par gang bsgo ba// dam bcas phrin las de ni grub par mdzod// de slad bgegs dang lo ga 'dren tshar bcad ltar// 'gro ba nyam
7b7(rgyud 'grel): thag 'di ni gzung ba'i phyir// sdug bsngal des bsal bde mchog la sbyar ba'i// khro rgyal khyed kyis deng 'dir byin brlabs gsol// de nas 'gro bde n+ya kra sha'i steng du banag la// gdus 
7b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad de// na mo rat+na tra yA ya nas hUM phaT kyi bar du brjod// de nas las bum gyis bkru zhing sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas// zhes pa nas/ sdig pa kun 
8a1(rgyud 'grel): las rnam par thar zhes pa'i bar du khrus kyi phan yon brjod cing bkru'o// de nas khrus sa'i stegs bu gsum pa la khru do stong par dbus su bzhag la/ khru phyed lha rnams la phyogs 
8a2(rgyud 'grel): skyong rnams bkod la khru gang pha rta babs med pa'i sgo bzhi bris te/ dbus su rtswa ku sha bting bar 'gro ba der bzhag pa'am/ khras sa'i stegs bu ma 'byor na/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha lnga bum par
8a3(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis spyan drangs la/ rma bya'i sgo la sogs pa mtshan ma lnga po phyis la/ dertsa ku sha'am ras dkar po bting la/ 'gro ba der bzhag la bum pa rnams thogs te/ gang la ser sna rnams
8a4(rgyud 'grel): chags pa'i// rnams 'joms dri med mdzad pa yi// thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du sdud mdzad cing // 
8a5(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des// khyed la
8a6(rgyud 'grel): bde legs byed par 'gyur// skyob pa gang gis byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang gis 
8a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rab 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten// brgya byin bcas pa'i lha 
8a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu byin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kun gyis bsams pa yis// khyed kyi 'dod don gang yin pa// 
8b1(rgyud 'grel): donon de de ring grub gyur cig/ khyed cag lam 'gro ba de legs shog/ phyir 'od dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shog/ ces brjod la/ na mo tA tra yA ya na sa na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra 
8b2(rgyud 'grel): bAnA ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pA ta ye/ oM dz+wa la na ma ya/ shAn ti ku ru swA hA/ zhes khro bo bzhi'i sngags dang 'bru spel la bkru/ sdig pa dang nad dang gdon la sogs pa dag par bsams la/ shar sgo nas bton la gsum la skyabs su 'gro 
8b3(rgyud 'grel): ba byin la snying gar rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi phyag mtshan bskyed cing bcug la bzhag/ de nas slob ma rdo rje'i rwa 'dzin du bcug la/ ya gcig nas slob dpon gyis bzung la/ 'gro ba 'di la nga yis 
8b4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung zin gyis// da ni 'di la su yang gnod mi byed// gal te 'di la gnod pa byas gyur na// mgo bo tshal pa brgyar ni 'gas par 'gyur// zhes brjod la/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'am
8b5(rgyud 'grel): bsrung skud gdags/ nyi ma gza' las grol ba bzhin du che ge mo 'di yang nad dang gdon la sogs pa las grol bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig mang du brjod cing rol mo mang du yang 
8b6(rgyud 'grel): rdung du gzhug go/ de nas ras dkar po gtsang ma'i steng du bkra shis kyi rdzas rnams bzhag ste/ yungs kar dang / dur ba dang / bil ba dang / gi waM dang / li khri dang / zho dang / me long dang / 
8b7(rgyud 'grel): dung g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / brgya byin te/ yungs kar rdo rje'i rigs te thams cad du/ bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms par byed pa po// mthu stobs yon tan phun sum tshogs
8b8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bar/ bkra shis des kyang thams cad zhi bar shog/ dur bas tshe ni 'phel bar byed pas ste// rdo rje sems dpa' che ni rab grub nas// nyon mongs skye shi rgyun chad gyur pa yi// 
9a1(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis des kyang tshe ni 'phel bar shog/ bil bas rgyu rkyen 'bras bur gyur pa'i chos// 'jig rten pa las 'das pa'i spyod pa kun// byang chub snying po mchog tu gyur pa yi// / 
9a2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis des kyang mchog tu grub gyur cig/ gi wang dug gsum 'jomos pa'i nad kyi sman// chos kyi chos nyid rab tu rtogs nas ni// nyon mongs zug rngu med par gyur pa yi// bkra shis 
9a3(rgyud 'grel): des kyang sdug bsngal bral gyur cig/ li khri dmar po dbang gi rang ba'i na te// chos rnams ma lus dbang du bsdus nas kyang // chos kyi rgyal srid rab brtan gyur pa ste// bkra shis des 
9a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang khyod srid brtan gyur cig/ zho ni kun gyi snying por gyur pa na// snying po rnam dag ye shes rnam rtogs nas// yon tan chos kyi dbyings su gyur pa yi// bkra shis des kyang dug gsum zhi bar 
9a5(rgyud 'grel): shog/ me long ye shes chen po'i rgya mtsho yis// ye shes rgya mtsho mchog tu bdag gyur te// rnam dag chos la thogs med longs spyod pa'i// bkra shis des kyang deng khyod dga' gyur cig/ 
9a6(rgyud 'grel): dung ni chos kyi sgra rnams sgrogs pa'i tshul// ye shes rgya mtsho nyid du bdag gyur te// chos rnams ma lus yongs su ston pa yi// bkra shis des kyang tshig la dbang thob shog ces blangs la 
9a7(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la sbyin no// de mi 'byor na dkar gsum tsam mam 'bras can la bkra shis brjod la sbyin/ slob mas kyang 'byor tshad kyis mchod sbyin bya/ de nas slar bum pa'i lha dang dkyil
9a8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bum pa'i lha la gang yang bdag blo gti mug la sogs kyis bshags// oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// la sogs kyis ye shes pa gshegs su gsol la/ dam 
9b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig rnams rang la bsdus la rang bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bya'o// de nas chos thams cad ni gdong ma nas dag pa'o// rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'o// zhes brjod cing rdul tshon phyags la bum pa dang / dman
9b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams chu bo'am gnas mthon por bskyal lo// dam pa rnams kyi gzhung bzung nas// sna tshogs rgyad la rab brten te// rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga ldan pa yi// 
9b3(rgyud 'grel): khrus kyi cho ga brtsams pa las// dri med dge ba gang thob des// 'gro kun sdug bsngal zhi nas kyang // lam mchog rnams la zhugs gyur cig/ rigs sngags 'chang gi slob dpon rat+na 
9b4(rgyud 'grel): las mdzad pa'i rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga gzhan la phan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra b+ho d+hi dang / lo tsA ba tshul dge rin chen gyis bsgyur ba'o// 
9b5(rgyud 'grel): rdorje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba bzhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi dA ra d+ha ra ni sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 
9b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// mi shigs kun 'joms rdo rje 'dzin// khros shing gtum pa'i sku mnga' ba// rdo rje yon tan rdzogs btud de// de nyid bsgrub pa'i rim
9b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bshad// dad brtan g.yod ngang rgyal med// ser sna chu shing bla ma gus// 'di la lhag par che dad pas// sgrub pa 'di 'bad bde legs shog/ dang por yid 'od phyogs su'ang // 'a 
9b8(rgyud 'grel): ba bsgral ba'i bsam pa yis// rtag tu 'di la brtson par bya// maN+Dal mchod dang gtor ma dang // las dang po yis rnal 'byor pas// dmigs pa'i rten yang bri bar bya// rang nyid phyi nang 
10a1(rgyud 'grel): khrus byas te// khyad par du ni lus kyi khrus// dri yi chu yis rtag tu bya// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// rang nyid zla ba sa bon bsam// de yi 'od kyi bla ma sogs// nam mkha'i phyogs 
10a2(rgyud 'grel): su dmigs nas ni// byin gyis brlabs par gsol ba gtab// de nas sems can thams cad la// lhag par byams pa bskyed par bya// de bzhin snying rje dka' ba dang // btang snyoms tshul/ 
10a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bsgom par bya// de rjes rnam par mi rtog pa'i// rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom par bya// de la cung zad dmigs nas ni// rnam par rtog par ldang bar bya// gzugs la sogs pa mi dmig 
10a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang // sngags kyi sgra ru bsgoms par bya// de rjes rang gi shes pas ni// sngags kyi phreng bar bsgom par bya// gsung gi rnam par rdzogs pa yi// phra zhing gsal ba'i rnam par ro// de nas zla 
10a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor de// gsal zhing cha ma 'dres par bsam// de yi 'od kyi 'gro ba rnams// rnam par 'joms par byas nas ni// tshur la bsdu ba'i tshul gyis ni// rang snying rnam par 'joms// 
10a6(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom// zhabs gnyis chu 'dzin dag la ni// g.yon brgyang ba ni rnam par zhugs// skra ni in+d+ra nI la dang // rdo rje'i snying po dang yang mtshungs// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste// spyan 
10a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar dpral ba khro gnyer can// mgo skyes dmar ser gyen 'greng ba// gsum po che zhing sbrul gyis brgyan// smad ni btis mnan pa ste// sku stod dar la yis dkris pa// rin po che yi bu 
10a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyan can// rang gi bdag po dbul gnas// g.yas pargya gram phyogs gsum bsnams// g.yon pa sngogs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin// srang zhing mkhregs pa'i sku dang ldan// 'ja' ltar 
10b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i bdag nyid du// bdag nyid rtag du bsam par bya// dam tshig phyag rgya bcing bar bya// sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab bya zhing // gnas lnga dag tu bdug par bya// oM badz+ra dz+wal na 
10b2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA// de nas rang mdog phyug mtshan dang // blo yis gsal bar bsgom par bya// gsal ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya// de las skyon sngags bzlas pa// de ni 
10b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi dang nang gi'o// de la nang gi bshad bya ste// rang nyid zla ba rang sa bon// de yi tha ma gsang sngags rgyal// mu tig 'ja' dang mar me ltar// rnam pa de ldan zla bar bsgom// de la cung zhig dmig 
10b4(rgyud 'grel): nas // gsung sngags rgyal po bzlas// de dag don pa shAr+b+ha mA la na sugs/ oM mr-i pa sa phyi'i bar dug// de na nga bzlas pa'o// snyed gas smras/ 
10b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang gsang sngags rgyal po bzlos// sngags kyi 'brug gi sgra dang bcas// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par spro// gdug pa can rnams bsdigs par mdzad// de bzhin spro zhing bsdu ba ni// 
10b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag spyod la// zhi la 'od zer dkar po ste// dbang la lcags kyu dmar po'o// rgyas pa la ni ser po ste// de ltar las dang rjes mthun par// 'od zer dag kyang spro bar bya// phyi ni// 
10b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'o// de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni// las rnams kun tu spyad par bya// de dag rab tu bshad pa ni// rig sngags bcad dang bcing ba dang // phung bus gdab cing mnan pa bya// de bzhin 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): nor sogs rgyas pa dang // sdig sogs zhi dang dbang du bya// de la dbang du bya ba ni// bya ru dmar 'dra'i sa gzhi la// mo yi pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra ba'i// thab khung dag ni bca' zhing
11a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de nas star bu'i me bus te// me ye lha ni bdag po nyid// dmar po lcags kyu thogs bsams nas// mngon byas nas ni 'od zer spro// gsang sngags 'jug la las mthun gdags// 
11a3(rgyud 'grel): star bu'i 'bru dang me tog dmar// phub ma dag ni brgya stong bsreg/ de yis gang 'dod de bzhin no// pad ltar dkar ba'i sa gzhi la// zla rgyas 'dra ba'i thab khung du// tsan dan dkar po'i me
11a4(rgyud 'grel): sbar te// rang lha dkar po bdud rtsir ldan// de la skad cig dmigs byas la// tsan dan dkar po'i 'o ma spag/ de bzhin dkar po'i rdzas rnams la// de bzhin yang ni sngags bzlas te// ji 
11a5(rgyud 'grel): tsam nus pa'i sbyin sreg bya// sa gzhi ser zhing 'phos pa na// dbang chen lta bu'i dbyibs su bya// mkhas pas thabs ni bca' bya zhing // star kA a ru ra'i me// cho ga dang bcas sper bya ste// 
11a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bur bcas pa'i yam shing la// de bzhin pa ru la sogs kyis// dbang chen la gnas bcom ldan 'das// gser mdog 'dra zhing dbang chen 'phro// de la sbyin sreg stong byas la// gang/ 
11a7(rgyud 'grel): dag 'dod pargyas par bya// de dag las kyi rim pa ste// rang nyid bsnyen pa rdzogs pas su// gsang sngags rgyal po rjes dran bya// gang dag gdon gyis nyen pa yi// cho ga la sogs bshad par 
11a8(rgyud 'grel): bya// dkyil 'khor legs par byas nas ni// bum pa rdza sogs ldan par bri// gsang sngags brgya dang gcig bzlas te/ bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor steng bzhag ste// de la khrus ni lan 
11b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum bya// bsrung srud mdud pa gsum pa ni// dpung pa'am srin lag dag la bcing // des ni grol bar the tsom med// 'khor lo dag gis bsrung bya ni// rtsibs bzhi'i mtshams su mtshon 
11b2(rgyud 'grel): char ldan// mu khyud me ri rdo rjes bskor// gur kum gi waM dag la bris nas ni// snga dro cho ga ldan par bsrung bar bya// de ltar 'di ni bsrung ba'i rgyal po ste// 'gro ba rnams la gsang 
11b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyal pos brlab// de rgyud de dang gzhan las gsungs pa'o// oM badz+ra dz+wa lA na ya swA hA// oM tsu ru tsu ru tsan+d+ra ki li kI la ya swA hA/ oM tra sa ya badz+ra ki li kI la ya swA hA/ oM 
11b4(rgyud 'grel): ha ra ha ra badz+ra da ra ya swA hA/ oM pre ha ra pra ha ra badz+ra pra bAny+dza na ye swA hA// bsrung ba yi'o// na mo ra ta na tra yA ya/ na me shur+N+Na badz+ra pa Na ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ ta d+ya thAM/ oM sarba 
11b5(rgyud 'grel): byA ti sarba bag+h+nAn/ sarba dur sa ma ni/ sarba dur mi ti/ sarba gra he/ sarba dza re/ sarba ka ya la smi du/ sarba u pa the pe bya sarba sha truM/ sarba pA paM shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes khrus kyi'o// 
11b6(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba pu sa twa ye puSh+TiM ku ru ye swA hA/ rgyas pa yi'o// oM badz+ra bA shaM ku ru swA hA// zhes dbang du bya'o// 'di rnams las dang mthun pa'i sngags kha las kyang shes par bya'o// 'di ni rdo rje rnam 
11b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'joms kyi sbubs thabs rgyud dang 'brel pa'i las dang bcas par shes par bya'o// gzhan yang 'dir ma bkod pa rnams bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// 'di ni sgrub thabs kun gyi 
11b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal// rang sems mos pa'i rjes 'brel pa'i// rtog pa dang bcas sgrub pa'i thabs// rnal 'byor rnams la phan byed yin// 'di byas bsod nams dri med pa// zla ba yang ngo bzhin du 
12a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phel gyur pa'i// 'gro rnams mos pa'i bye brag 'grub 'gyur te// rnam par 'joms pa'i sku 'grub shog/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs las dang bcas pa slob dpon 
12a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// // 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga/ chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas kyang // thugs rjes gtan du mya ngan mi 'da' zhing // 'dod 
12a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don grub mtha' yas gzugs mnga' ba// dpa' brtan rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// de la dang por bum pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas/ nor bu yungs kar dur ba dang // rin 
12a4(rgyud 'grel): na banas ma gdung// nugs na/ / mags kyi shA dag / zhes pa sangs pas/ ba 
12a5(rgyud 'grel): rem dngul la ma zangs las byas kyang rung zhabs kyi gdub kor ni 'phang du sor gcig gi tshad du byas la gdags so// dbus kyi dbyibs ni lhung bzed 'dra bar bya'o// mgrin pa'i 'phang du sor 
12a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i tshad du bya'o// mgrin pa'i nang gi tshad kyang sor bzhi pa'i sbubs su bya'o// mgrin pa'i kha khyer phyir bskyed pa ni sor gnyis kyi tshad du byas la/ kha'i cha ga'i bshal ka sor gcig gi 
12a7(rgyud 'grel): tshad du bya'o// dbul po rnams kyi dngul dang gser la sogs pa las bya ba mi rnyed pas de'i phyir rgyu gzhan la bya bar gsungs te/ bum pa pad+mo dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar zhing b+hu ru dang li khI dang 
12a8(rgyud 'grel): mtshal gyi mdog ltar dmar ba dang / so btang nges pa'i nag po ra ri med par bya'o// ltor ni chu phul lnga yan chod nas bcu shong ba'i tshad gar nus pa'i tshad byas te/ de nas lag pa byug spos kyis 
12b1(rgyud 'grel): byugs te/ dri zhim po shin tu bkra shis pa'i bdug pas gdugs la/ gu gul la/ oM a mri ti hUM phaT ces bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags kyis lan bdun bzlas pas bum pa'i nang du bdugs la/ 
12b2(rgyud 'grel): chu gtsang ma srog chags med par btsags pasaM bkang ste/ de'i nang du tsan dan dang / ga pUr dang / gur ku ma dang / dzA ti dang / glartsi lnga po bsres po'i chu yang blugs nas der rin po che lnga zhes 
12b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nor bu rin po che dang / bya ru dang / gser sa le sbra ma dang / mu tig dang / shel dag dang / sma na lnga zhes bya ba/ bya kri dang / seng kri dang / gi bri kar ni dang / sa hA dang / sa ha de ba dang / 
12b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bru lnga zhes bya ba/ nas dang / so ba dang / ti la dang / mon sran dang / mon sran gre'u rnams kyang bcug la bum pa'i khar gA sder ram dngul phor ram/ kham por gtsang ma'i nang du yungs 
12b5(rgyud 'grel): kar blugs pa'i snod bzhag ste/ ras gtsang mkha tshar mgod pas bram pa'i kha dang yungs kar gyi snod dang bcas pa dkri zhing g.yogs la bcing ste/ mdud pa'i steng du ba'i lci brgyas
12b6(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa'i tshul du blan la der rtswa dur ba'i nyag ma bdun btsugs te phyag na rdo rje la dbul bar 'os pa'i me tog dmar po dri zhim po 'am/ yang na me tog dri zhim po gang yang rung po'i phreng bas kyang 
12b7(rgyud 'grel): bram pa'i mgrin po bskor ba'i drin no// dkyil 'khor med par bum pa 'ba' zheg gos 'dod pa'i las myi 'grub pas theg mar dkyil 'khor bri nas brtag dgos pas spyi rgyu dpung bzang gis 
12b8(rgyud 'grel): zhus pa las 'dir sbyar bar bya ste/ phyugs lhas shing cig lha'i khang pa 'am// lam gyi bzhi mdo khang stong nags tshal du// zhes gsungs so// dkyil 'khor bri bar bston pa yang de nyid las// 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa gru bzhi'i tshad// tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bri// phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su bzung // sgo bzhi pa la phyogs kyi rtswa yang 
13a2(rgyud 'grel): dgra ma zhes gsungs te/ de yang sa gzhi shin tu sbyangs shing shin du 'thabs par bcags pa'i rnam lnga zhes bya bar/ 'o ma dang / mar dang / zho dang / gcin dang lci ba rnams dang / spos rnam 
13a3(rgyud 'grel): bsres pa rnams kyis bskus la thig gdab par bya'o// gru bzhi'i tshad khru bzhi par byas la phur bus legs par gdab bo// de'i dbus su gsang sngags 'chang khrus byed pa'i sa khru do 
13a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go/ de'i phyi rim khru gang khyon yod pa la cha gsum du bgos te/ dang por 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi gnas su bya'o// gnyis pa ni sgo khyad mu khyud mu tig gi phreng ba dag bri'o// gsum 
13a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya me thab yin// gshin rje'i phyag rgya ba tsin te// bden bral gyi ni ral gror bistan// chu ba dag gi ni zhag par bstan// rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin// ku bI ra yi dbyug to yin// 
13a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug gi ni rtagasum gsungs// sa'i phyag rgya bum pa yin// nyi b+ha'i phyag rgya zlum por bya zhes gsungs so// dkyil 'khor na mo bzhir sod cing // bkra shes brgyud pa'i 
13a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ba dang // 'khor lo dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / pad+ma dang / bum pa dang / dung dang / nya dag bril pas mdzes par bya'o// dbus su ni ku sha gding zhing phyi rol 
13b1(rgyud 'grel): thog dag tu yang ku sha dgram mo// steng du yang bla res legs par dag bcing me tog gi phreng ba dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lnga ldi dang / me long gis brgyan na khrus kyi cho ga bkra shis par 
13b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyu ro// de nas bum pa yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ grwa bzhir seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags gong du smos pa bzlas shing btsugs nas/ tshon sA lnga 
13b3(rgyud 'grel): yis skud pa la yang gsang sngags de nyid bzlas shing bskor bas mtshams bcad par bya'o// bshos dang gtor ma dgod pa yang // dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las// bza'i dang 
13b4(rgyud 'grel): sha chang la phug la sogs bcas// 'bras can 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin zhes gsungs te/ ma phye ba yang 'os 'os su phye ste/ sha chang la phug dag ni gshi ni rje dang bden bral 
13b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba bdag nyid phyi nang gi dri ma dag par byas la/ gos sar pa bgos te/ cho ga brtsams pa'i dbang du mdzad nas/ des ni rab 
13b6(rgyud 'grel): khrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yi dge sems dang ning // gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo sde 'di ni 
13b7(rgyud 'grel): nyan byed na zhes gsungs te// de'i don ni rang gi rgyud dag pa de dkyil 'khor gyi nub sgor 'greng la/ lag pa byug spos kyis byugs nas/ rang gi lA dza ltar minos pa bzhin du bsgoms la/ 
13b8(rgyud 'grel): mig gnyis su yi ge hUM 'bar ba re bsams la sau gol gyi sgra phyung zhing / phyogs su bltas pas mtshams bcad bgegs bskrad nas slar stan bde ba la 'dug nas dkyil 'khor de yang 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i lha'i gnas bzang po dpe med par dmigs shing / bum pa de yang yid bzhin gyi mtsho'i bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar dmigs te/ lag pa 
14a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las/ kha phye ste pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni pad+ma gdan gyi phyag rgya yin te/ de'i sngags la/ oM pad+ma ka ma la ye swA hA/ zhes brjod nas yid bzhin gyi mtsho'i
14a3(rgyud 'grel): dbus su pad+ma'i sdong po dang lo ma dang 'dab ma dang ze ba dang / snying por bcas pa dpe med par bzang zhing che ba zhig bsams te/ mchod yon gyi snod blangs la sbreng zhing 'di skad du/ dad pa dang / 
14a4(rgyud 'grel): ni dam tshig gis// bdag la mchod yon bzhes su gsol// mchod yon bzhes nas de nyid du// mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// A ha ra a hA ra/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra pU dzi te 
14a5(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ 'phags pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs par rig pa dang / bar 'dir phyir 'breng ba'i bgegs bskrad/ a mri tas bsang / yang na rtsa sngags// 
14a6(rgyud 'grel): sam bskrad sngags kyis so// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung gi sen mos mthe bong mnan te/ lhag ma gsum nas do tsam gyis ma reg par byas te/ rdo rje'i tshul du byas nas bstan pa ni dam
14a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yin te/ de'i sngags la/ oM shang ka re ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes brjod nas/ gdan de la 'phags pa khro bo yi rgyal po phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kyi khyad par las 
14a8(rgyud 'grel): byung ba/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba mdog sngon po yid tsam khro ba/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje rgya gram las rwa phyogs gcig med pa bsnams pa phyag g.yon pa bkur brten cing
14b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gying ba/ dbu rgyan rtse bran tsAn/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ na bzla stod g.yogs dar la smad g.yogs tshig gu bsnams pa/ 'khor rigs kyi lha dpag tu med pa dang gshegs 
14b2(rgyud 'grel): par dmigs shing / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bkug ste/ phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad 'byung 
14b3(rgyud 'grel): bar byas la/ gung mo gzhibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo bkug la ni sa gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas te/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gi zhibs pa ni rdo rje rnam par
14b4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms partsa ba'i phyag rgya las thams cad byed do// de'i sngogs la/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la na ye swA hA/ de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga rim bzhin du dbul te/ dang por byug spos dbul te/ 
14b5(rgyud 'grel): gtsang zhing gtsang mar sbyang ba yi/ lha rdzas bzang po'i byug spos 'di// bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhis nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// A ha ra A ha ra sarba 
14b6(rgyud 'grel): bid d+hA d+ha ri pu dzi te swA hA/ de nas me tog dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar skyes pa yi// lha rdzas dam pa'i me tog 'di// bdag gi dad pas dbul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag/ 
14b7(rgyud 'grel): / nas bdug par / da / sa badrug dag sa la la sa byed// 
14b8(rgyud 'grel): la dgyes par mdzod// bshos dbul te/ sman rnams khu ba yi gar 'ong // dri yis rgyas pa lha yi zas// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par 
15a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// 'di yan chad kyi sngags ni gong mar spros pa gong ma bzhin du sbyor ro// de'i 'og tu mar me dbul te/ gnod rnams 'joms shing bkra shis la// dge zhing mun/ 
15a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam sel ba// lha rdzas bzang po'i zhugs mar 'di// bdag gis dad pas 'bul logs kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// A lo ka A lo ka sarba bad d+ha d+hA ra pu dzi 
15a3(rgyud 'grel): te swA hA// de nas gdon rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul// nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po// dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs 
15a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang // gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bdag gis pus mo sol btsug nas su// thal sbyar de dag la ni gsol ba 'debs// bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor// 
15a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa rnams// gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir gshegs shig/ sems can gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yul gang gnas dang // gang dag shar 
15a6(rgyud 'grel): nub nyi ma'i khyims gnas dang // chu bo kun dang chu'i ngogs rnams dang // rin chen gnas su 'dra gnas ni bcas pa dang // rdzing dang mtsho dang lu ma ltang lteng dang // khron pa dang ni ngan/ 
15a7(rgyud 'grel): 'grog chu mig dang // grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer nags tshal dang // khang stong dag dang lha yi gnas dag dang // lha khang mchod rten 'dug gnas dang // mu stegs gnas dang glang // 
15a8(rgyud 'grel): chen khang pa dang // gang dag rgyal po'i dkor khang gnas pa dang // srang dang khyams dang lam kha'i bzhi mdo dang // gang dag shing gcig po dang lam po che// dur khrod chen po nags tshal
15b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang // gang dag seng ge glang chen dred kyi gnas// 'jigs pa'i sa dang 'grog na gnas pa dang // gling bzangs rnams su gnas ni bcas pa dang // gang dag lhun po dur khrod gnas pa rnams// rab 
15b2(rgyud 'grel): tuthugs dgyes dri dang phreng ba dang // bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod dgus 'bul// 'di dag bzhes nas bsdams dang gsol mdzod// lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba las kha bye ste// bkan pa ni 
15b3(rgyud 'grel): gtir ma sbyin pa'i b+hag rgya'o// de'i sngags la sbyin po rnams la/ klung ker/ gzanams la/ mi tsam ci/ 'byung po rnams la/ glang gung / thams cad la/ na moHsarbata thA ga ta~M D+D+h+ya/ bai sh+na m+'uShe b+hU 
15b4(rgyud 'grel): sarbaHta ta khaM ud ga te/ s+pho ra Na hi maM/ ga ga na khaM swA hA/ de ltar gdon rnams la gtor ma byin nas ni phyogs skyong rnams la mchod pa/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba los/ sor mo dbus 
15b5(rgyud 'grel): ma gsum ba kyed de/ pad+ma'i tshul du bya'o// de'i sngags la/ dbang ldan phyogs su ru tra ya swA hA/ dbang po'i phyogs su shag kra ya swAhA/ me'i phyogs su a ga ne ye mA hA/ gshin rje'i phyogs mu ze ba 
15b6(rgyud 'grel): sata ye swA hA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su rak+Sha sa a ti pa ta ye swA hA/ chu lha'i phyogs me ga a she na ya swAhA/ rlung wA'i 'og gi phyogs su be ya be ye swA hA/ ku be ra'i phyogs su yag sha b+hid d+ha re swA hA/ steng gi/ 
15b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su a did d+ya ye swA hA/ nyi ma'i'o// zla ba'i tsan+d+rA ye swA hA/ 'og gi phyogs su pri thi bya ye swA hA/ sa'i lha mi yi'o// de ltar phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod de// bzlas brjod bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ 
15b8(rgyud 'grel): lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad// rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas su// rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig/ ces 'byung ba'i don ni de ltar 'phags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): dang // 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'byung po thams cad la mchod pa byas nas/ bum pa'i nang du 'phags pa spyan drangs pa de nyid kyang srog dang bcas pa lta bu dmigs te/ de'i thugs kar zla baH/ 
16a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa la yi go'i phreng ba rnams bkod de bzlas so// lha'i sku dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge'i phreng ba la dus gcig tu dmigs pa ni 'jig rten na tha 'og la sogs pa'i gding 
16a3(rgyud 'grel): bawa'o lta ba dang 'dra'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu'i nang du yi ge'i phreng ba ji ltar mang ba ji ltar bkod ce na/ sems goms pa rnams la mi rung ba med de/ chu cung du shin tu dang ba'i nang du nyi zla dang / gza' 
16a4(rgyud 'grel): skar la sogs pas brgyan pa'i nam mkha' thams cad snang ba bzhin no// rgyal po zhes pas badzin du zad de/ gzhan yang khrus kyi sbyar ba bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas med sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags 
16a5(rgyud 'grel): dag ni thams cad kyi// mi bzad pa yi nang rnams kun// de dag thams cad zhi bar blta// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar zhes gsungs te/ de ltar bzlas 
16a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod kyi grangs chang nas phyogs bcu'i lha rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyi tshigs su bcad pa yang bsgrag par bya ste/ dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar phyogs gdon gyi chogs 
16a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// me ste sreg bya za ba'i lha// 'byung ba'i rgyal po gdan gyi bdag/ phyogs mtshams gdon gyi chags bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyug kyang 'tshal// 
16a8(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje be con 'chang ba'i lha// ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha// srin po'i rgyal po gdon 
16b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag/ sna tshogs bcas kyi tshogs bcas pa// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha// bden pa bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag/ rub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal 
16b2(rgyud 'grel): rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// tshig bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste// rlung gi tshogs kyi gdon bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// gnod sbyin lag na be con thog/ nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste// byang phyogs gdon 
16b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha// bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la// mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// 'og gi klu ste sa yi lha// 
16b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// de nas shu ti dang ba'i rnam lnga chu dang sbyar ba la bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags gong du smos pa btab ste/ khrus byed pa'i lus bkrus te dril nas khrus byas te gos sar pa gos nas dkyil gyi sgor 'dug ste/ de la bsrung ba chen po bya'o// den 
16b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byin te// dkyil 'khor ba skor du bcug la/ gus pas phyag byas la/ cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus sur+Na ku sha bkram pa'i steng du bde bar 'dug la/ gsang sngags bzlos pas bum pa 
16b6(rgyud 'grel): blangs te/ gzungs sngags bzlas shing khrus byed du bcug la phyi nang gi dri ma thams cad ma lus par dag par bsam mo// shin tu bde legs dang bkra shis dang / rgyal bar gyur cig bya ba'i tshig dang rol mo'i sgra skad rab tu snyan pa dang yang 
16b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan par 'gyur ro// yungs kar dang / zho dang dur ba dang / li khri dang / me long dang / dung dang / bil ba'i 'bras bu dang / 'gi wang rnams kyang slob ma'i nang du ras khri'u bting ba'i nang du bzhag ste/ bkra shis 'don pa'i lag tu bzhag nas rdzas de 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams re re nas blangs shing sbyin no// de nas bya ba pa bya ste/ rma bya'i steng du zla ba'i steng du gzungs rings bsams la/ des bya ba cing gzungs rings brjod pas bshams la che ge mo'i sarba bya ti la sogs pa sbyar ro// 
17a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas bsrung ba bya ste/ skud pa la bsrung ba byas la gdags/ gzungs rings bris la de la rab gnas byas pa gdags so// de nas yang bsrung ba bya ste/ rdo rje phyed de'i lag tu byin nas zhi ba dang dga' ba'i sems kyis long shig ces bya ba'i 
17a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig kyang brjod par bya'o// rdo rje phyed po de la bzung nas gdon thams cad las thar nas ldang ste/ zla ba sgra gcan 'dzin gyis gzung ba las thar pa bzhin du lus sdig pa dang bral ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ 
17a4(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed// rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste// dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan// sems can dbang po nyams pa dang // tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs 
17a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang // nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang // mya ngan ngal las gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar byad snyems 
17a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan mnga' las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang // cho ga 'di yi phan yon gyis// de dag las ni thar bar 'gyur// zhes dgongs pa'o// de nas 'byor na ni ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// yang 
17a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dun 'di ltar bya'o// byams pa che dang snying rje che// mnyam par ldan par byas kyang rung // de yang zhi bar shes bya ste// nang gi sbyin sreg dam pa yin// 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga slob dpon ye shes 
17a8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / @ma// dang la do rnam par joms pa'i tsheganas byab bzhugs so// // rgya gar gdang/ brda bo dAran maN+Da la shrI bi d+hin pam khod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal 
17b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal la sogs dag par mdzad pa ste// rnam par 'joms pa khro bo rnams kyi rje btsan nyid// dpal ldan yid khro sa log lta gcod pa'i dpal// rdo rje bsnams pa las 'joms 'jig byed 
17b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// le'u yi grangs las nges pa'i snying po ste// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rtsa bar 'di gsungs thog ma'o// de nyid dkyil 'khor cho ga las kyi rim pa nyid// 'di nyid du ni rnam par bshad par bya'o// sa yi cho ga go rims ltar// gzhan gyi 
17b3(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rim par dbye// sa stegs 'dom gang gru bzhi la// phyogs mtshams ma nor legs par mnyam// 'khrul pa med pa'i blo yis bya// dpangs su chag gang brtsigs par bya// srad bu mnyam ldan gsum pa sgril las// byin 
17b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab te g.yas nas gdab// cha chen cha bran mkhas pas dbye// tshen sA lnga yi phye ma la// byin gyis brlab la legs par dgod// dang po pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// gnyis pa'i chal 'khor lo brgyad// mu khrud rdo rje ra ba dang // 
17b5(rgyud 'grel): gru chad snam bu gnyis pa dang // sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bri// de nyid kha dog nges par ni// pad+ma dkar po 'khor lor dmar// mu khyud gzhi ma dkar po la// rdo rje rnams ni lcags dang mtshungs// gru chad gnyis ni ljang gu la// snam bu 
17b6(rgyud 'grel): dang po ser po ste// de bzhin gnyis pa dkar po che// sgo bzhi so so'i rigs dang sbyar// lha rnams so so'i phyag mtshan ni// so so'i gnas su dgod par bya// de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// dgos pa dag ni tshang ba la// dkyil 'khor// 
17b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i rdzas nyid ni// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pa// bzhi pa phyogs kyi bzlas pa bya// dkyil 'khor gyis ni ngos bzhir gdab// tshon sna lnga yi skud pas spel// gser dngul zangs lcags bum pa nyid// tshad dang ldan pa dag 
17b8(rgyud 'grel): pa la// gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkris shing dgang // 'bras bu 'dab mar ldan pa yi// kha brgyan ldan pa lnga nyid la// so so'i mtshan ma btab la bzhag/ las kyi bum pa sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// sgrub pa bdag nyid 
18a1(rgyud 'grel): mdun du yang // mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bsham// nya dang bu ram sran chung 'bras// khre dang tshe la sogs pa yi// gtor ma gsum ni g.yas nas bzhag/ de nas phyi nang khrus byas te// gtsang ma'i gos ni rab 
18a2(rgyud 'grel): gon la// dri zhim rdzas ni mur bzhin du// sems bskyed pas ni gzhan don mchog/ bdun po yongs su dag par bya'o// de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo nyid// ji ltar dmigs pa mkhas pas bsgom// dri chab byin gyis brlabs la/ 
18a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ hUM hUM zhes pas rngam pa dang // oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM zhes pas/ g.yas brkyang ba'i gar gyis ni// g.yon brkyang stabs kyis g.yon nas bskor// bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i sbyor ba bya// phyogs bcu'i khro bo ti ra yi// nga rgyal 
18a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas bsrung dang bcing // mtshams la sogs pa mkhas pas gcad// de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba'i ste// hUM yig sngon po'i 'phro 'du las// mchod dang don gnyis rdzogs par byas// 'dus pas/ 
18a5(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i phyag mtshan ni// sna tshogs rdo rje'i ngos gcig med// dbus su rnam par bsam par bya// de rjes sngags 'di rnam par brjod// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ b+ha ku la bi sho d+ha na ya swA hA/ zhes pa lan gsum brjod 
18a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// rnam 'joms nyid kyi sku ru 'gyur// de nyid dam tshig phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa las// gung mo gnyis ni bzhibs nas bsgreng // gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya ste// gsang sngags 'di yi legs par ni// byang 
18a7(rgyud 'grel): shar mtshams su gshin rje'o// oM ya man ta ka ya swA hA/ yang snying lag gnyis sor mo dgod// snying gar rtse mo sprad pa yang // oM a nan te swA hA// zhes pas shar du mtha' yas bskyed// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bsten pa// g.yas 
18a8(rgyud 'grel): pa nu ma'i thad kar bzung // oM a mri te a mr-i te// ba ri t+su zhes pas shar lhor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yon pa'i mthe bong sbrel byas la// oM su b+ha ni ki ra ban d+ha ri swA hA/ zhes pas lho ru gnod 
18b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa skyed// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag mnan// gung mo sor mo mthe'u chung ba sbeng // oM b+hin te badz+ra kro d+ha na kro d+ha sA hA// zhes pas lho nub sngon mthon bskyed// snga ma'i phyag rgya lta bu la// oM 
18b2(rgyud 'grel): ha ya grI ba swA hA/ zhes pas nub tu rta mgrin bskyed// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yas pa'i khu tshur gnyis sbrengs la// oM la pa ra dzi ta sa ti swAhA// zhes pas nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub pa skyed// lag gnyis khu tshur 
18b3(rgyud 'grel): bcangs pa las// mthe bong mthe'u chung gung mo ni// gshibs te sor sor bsgrengs byas la// oM badz+ra pA Ni d+ha na pa ti swA hA/ zhes byas byang tu gtum po'o// de nas so so'i phyag rgya bskyed// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa dang / 
18b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa bcangs te spyi bor bzhag/ lag gnyis khu tshur snying gar rtseg/ g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung g.yon pas bcang // lag gnyis brdebs pa'i tshul du bya// de ltar rim pa nges pa yis// gru chad la ni go rims bzhin// sngags 'di rgyal 
18b5(rgyud 'grel): chen bzhi rim par gsal bar rabaskyed par bya'o// oMn+ne ta ra Ta ye swAhA/ oM bi Tad+ha ka ye swaH/ oM bi ru b+hak+Sha ye swAt+ma/ oM bi tsa ra ye swA hA/ zhes pa rgyal po bzhi ru bskyed// de'i phyi rim sngam bral// bkra shis lha mo brgyad po'o// de'i 
18b6(rgyud 'grel): rim sngam bral// phyogs skyong ba ni de bzhin no// sgo ba zhir sgom gzhan dang mthun// de dag su mdog phyag mtshan ni// gtso bo'i gru mdog ldang ser la// g.yas brgya gram phyogs de ni// thugs kar bzung ste g.yon pa yang // bum pa sul 
18b7(rgyud 'grel): brten pa'o// yang na phyag gnyis bum pa ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes kha bcad la// phyag gnyis bzung ste thugs kar 'dzin// mtha' yas zhal gsum sku mdog mthing // phyag drug nges med mtshon chal// g.yon gyi 'og martse dgra ni// thugs kar 
18b8(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la nges pa'o// bdud rtsi bkyil pa su mdog dmar// zhal dang phyag gnyis sngar 'dral// 'og mdo sa gya gram 'dzin// gnod mdzes mdog ser sngar bzhin la// 'og mas tho ba thugs kar 'dzin// mi g.yo ba ni ljang dgul// rdo rje 
19a1(rgyud 'grel): ma// dbyug po thugs kar 'dzin// ma thon dpar pa ba 'dzin// gzhan byas mthab can pa la// gcan bar bkrugs kar dzan// gtam pa stug nag tsu dgra 'dzin// gshin na ldan gzhas gsum pa// ga 
19a2(rgyud 'grel): drug des med mtshan cha la// 'og ma gnyis pas btsan 'dzin// de nas gru rmad rgyal po ba'o// dkar me dam da nga gral// btsun pa bang du srin dang // rin pa che kyi'o// lha ma rnams kyi snga ma dag na// gsal byer 
19a3(rgyud 'grel): man sngon mol// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dpal be'u 'dzin// dbyangs can ma ni dkar mol// rang rtags g.yas pa 'khor lo'o// mdangs can ser mo pad+ma'o// 'od ldan mthang gargyal mtshan no// skyes chen dam ngam 
19a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhub bu 'dzin// dri med ma ya dmar mol// rang rtags g.yas pa bum pa 'dzin// yid bzang ljang gu bud ngung 'dzin// yid gzungs ldang ser g.yung drung 'dzin// phyogs spyod rnams kyi su mdog ni// brgya byin dkar 
19a5(rgyud 'grel): lardo rjegadengs// me lha dmar po rin chen byed// gshin rje mthing ga dbyug thobaskams// bden bral ljang gra ral gri'o// chu lha dmar po khri nags bsnams// rlung la dung kha be tson 'dzin// gnod sbyin ser po rin chen 'dzin 
19a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan dkar ser gyi shub// hi b+ha dkar pos dum 'bar// sa me skam sar mol// phyag na na chen bum pa bsnams// rko ma'i phyag ma tshan bu mdog ni// lugs gyu kar la lcags su 'dzin// nags pa sngal de bzhi/ 
19a7(rgyud 'grel): zhags// lcags sogs dmar mo lcags grogs 'dzin// dril bu ljang ser dril bu nyid// de ltar su mdog gas la snyoms la// ye shes dbang bskur dgug gzug ste/ de ltar gnal yas gas la dmigs la// hrI 
19a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang bsdus pa dang // shin tu bsdus pa gang mos la// bcu rtsa brgyad du dbul bar bya// de rjes mchod pa lnga yang dbul// bsnyen pa'i dus su dmigs pa gsum// legs par btags te mnyes par bya// sgrub pa bum pa/

19b8(rgyud 'grel): 'dung ba bzhin du mas mad pa// tho ba'i rgyam po yon nam tha' las kyang // 'di gshegs 'gro ba na byi mchod pa ba rnyes// sems cad dugagasum nad kyis gangs pal// thugs ci'i rtson brlabs bdud rtsi'i nga

20b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol// zhi ba dkar po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma dkar po phyag na dpal be'u bsnams// 'joms byed dkar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams// gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su gsol// lho phyogs rgyas pa ser

21b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams mang po tshar gcod cing // mtho ris gnas nas 'khor lo sbyar mdzad pa// phyogs skyong chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma'o// tshad med bzhi po mthar phyin ldan grub brtags// phyag rgya

23a7(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs rdo rje dril bu ma// sku mdog ljang ser 'od zer 'bar// phyag mtshan phyag na dril bu bsnams// de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul// de las dbang bskur cho ga las// ji ltar gsungs pa'i dbang rnams sbyin// bzod gsol/ 
23a8(rgyud 'grel): smon lam gdab pa nyid// de nas lha rnams so so yi// thugs ka'i sa bon las bsdus te// gshegs gsol dmigs med rgyas btab la// de nas dga' ston dbugs phyung ste// rig pa'i las dang gzengs kyang bstod// de nas// 
23b1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma byin brlabs te// mgon po'i gtor ma btang ba ni// sngags kyis spyan drangs ye shes bzhugs// paM las 'byung ba so so yi// sku mdog phyag mtshan so sor dmigs// de nas 'dzab dang bsnyen pa dbul// de yi sngags ni 'di 
23b2(rgyud 'grel): dag bzlas// rdo rje lce las yang dag byung // i e h+ye hi ha na tan bIn d+ha badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM e h+ye hi badz+ra na pa b+hIn+ta na maN+Dal bud+d+ha sarba b+ha smi ku ru sarbadraSh+TaM hU~M phaT/ oM a h+ye hi badz+ra kA la dat+ta ha na han hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hi badz+ra ki ri ti s+t+rai rak+Sha sad+d+hi 
23b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ta ye swA hA/ oM e h+ye hi nA ga badz+ra An ya sarba d+ha na d+har+ya/ sarba na ma ni/ mug ta laM ka ra d+ha sarba nA ga na ra ni tsi/ badz+ra d+ha ra ya/ sa ma yA ma nusma ra a ga d+ha a ga d+he/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha ra ha ra/ sran Na ma hA ts+tshid hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hi badz+ra a ni 
23b4(rgyud 'grel): man cig/ wAm nuldan pa #na byin pa thas wA/ ma sa na bad+han ma sa na 'dun # 
23b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams so so'i phyag rgya yis// mchod yon la sogs gtor ma la// sngags ni bdun tsam gcig dag gis// nges par dbul dang btab par bya'o// de nas mgon po mnyes pa yi// tshig 'di rnams kyang brjod par bya'o// hUM lha dang 
23b6(rgyud 'grel): lha min gnod sbyin lho 'phye grul// nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po// dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang // gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa yang // 
23b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi pus mo sa la btsugs gnas su// thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol ba 'debs// gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig/ dbang po rdo rje 'chang pa'i lha// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs 
23b8(rgyud 'grel): bcas la// mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal// me ste sreg bya za ba'i lha// 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar lho// mchod par/ gshin rje be con 'chang ba'i lha// ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ rtswa 
24a1(rgyud 'grel): ma// phyogs/ mchod par/ bden dang bral ba legs ldanan// srin pa'i rgyal ba gdon gyi bdag/ sbron pa/ mchod par/ zhags pa thogs pa cu yiH// klu'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ rug mchod 
24a2(rgyud 'grel): par/ rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// rigs 'dzin rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ nub byang / mchod par/ gnod sbyin lag na dbyug zo thogs// nor srungs rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ byang / mchod par/ dbang dang 
24a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha// bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ byang shar/ mchod par/ steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang // nyi ma zla ba gza' chen po// gza' dang rgyu sar bcas pa la// mchod par/ 'og gi klu 
24a4(rgyud 'grel): stes yilha// sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste// dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la// mchod par/ shar gyi phyogs nas brgya byin 'khor dang bcas// gtor ma phul ba 'di dag pazhes su gsol// me dang gshin rje bden bral srin 
24a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i bdag/ chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang // dbang ldan 'byung po'i bdag po lha dang ni// steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang // lha rnams kur dang ba yi klu rnams dang // ri yi lha rnams gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas// 
24a6(rgyud 'grel): so so so sor phul ba 'di dag kun// so so so so'i phyogs su bzhes nas kyang // sde dang dpung bcas bu smad 'khor bcas dang // gtor ma bdug pa me tog bdug spos rnams// rab tu dgyes rnam bzhes te bsnams nas gsol// de nas 'byung po/ 
24a7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs la gtor ma dag ni sbyin par bya// hUM 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng na gnas pa dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi yul gnas dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim gnas dang // ri rnams kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu bo kun dang 
24a8(rgyud 'grel): chu yi mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na gang dag gnas pa dang // rdzing dang mtsho dang lu ma lteng ka dang // khon pa dang ni ngam 'brog chu mig dang // grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer nags tshal dang // khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang // gang 
24b1(rgyud 'grel): ngag gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang // mu stegs spyi gnas drang srong sde gnas dang // gtsug lag khang chu glang chen khang pa dang // rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang // srang dang khyams dang grong gi mdun sa dang // gang 
24b2(rgyud 'grel): dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig dang // dur khrod dag dang nags tshal chen po dang // seng ge glang chen dred kyi gnas rnams dang // dgon pa nags chen rab tu 'jigs pa dang // gling ma bzang po dag na gang gnas dang // rab tu 
24b3(rgyud 'grel): dgyes shing go go gnas rnams su// me tog phreng ba byug spos bdug pa dang // stod dang mar me gtor ma gus 'bul bas// 'di dag bzhes nas so sor gnas nas gsol// bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// 
24b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas rig drug so so'i gtor ma btang // dbang rdzogs bkra shis smon lam gdab// dkyil 'khor bsdu ba mkhas pas brtsam// khrus kyi cho ga ji lta bar// khrus byas rol mo'i las bya'o// rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 
24b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi cho ga/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rje yi rang // sangs 
24b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byang chub yid kyi bzung // sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la// byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir// byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyis nas// sems can thams cad bdag gi mgron du 
24b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyer// byang chub spyod mchog bdag gis spyad par bgyis// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ bum pa slob ma lhag gnas bya// maN+Dal dag la rnam lngas byugs// de nas me tog rnam lnga dgod// mchod dang 
24b8(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po gtor ma bsham// rin chen bum par bco lnga blugs// gang yin mtshan bris ras mgul cing // dri zhim 'bras bcas shing gis brgyan// baM las rin chen bum pa bsam// de mgrin nyi zla rang sngags bsam// de las/ 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phros bdud rtsi gzhug/ de nas ci rigs par ni bzlas// slob ma khrus byas bshags sogs bya// de ni lhag par gnas pa'o// zhag gi don ni 'di lta ste// maN+Dal byugs la mchod pa dang // gtor ma 
25a2(rgyud 'grel): bsham pa snga ma bzhin// de nas maN+Dal dag la ni// lha gang yin pa'i mtshan ma dgod// bdag nyid bskyed nas dkyil 'khor mtshan// gang yin lha ru bskyed par bya// de la mchod dang bstod pa bya// de nas sngags kyang ci rigs 
25a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas// de nas bum pa gong bzhin no// de nas slob ma khras byas la// rigs mthun dar gyi gdong yang gdab// slob dpon la ni phyag kyang bya// yol ba'i nang du rdo rje dang // de la me tog gtor du gzhug/ gdong g.yogs 
25a4(rgyud 'grel): dkrol la chu dbang bskur// de nas sngags dang bsgom pa'i lung // byin la mchod dang gtor ma btang // lha gshegs mtshan ma bsdu bar bya// de ni sku yi dbang bskur ro// pad+ma badz+ra bdag gis mdzad// rdzogs so// // rdo rje rnam 
25a5(rgyud 'grel): par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dam tshig spyod pa'i nges pas ni// mi smra ba dang mi bya nyid// sra ba dang ni de bzhin mchod// tshim bya yid la rnam par bsgom// mkhas pas bsad bya rmongs bya nyid// brgyad po 'di dag bsrung byas 
25a6(rgyud 'grel): na// dam tshig tu ni yongs su grags// ci zhig smra zhe na ni// sngags dang rgyud kyi rang bzhin dang // dam tshig spyod dang 'dre ba dang // brdzun du smra ba rtsub pa'i tshig/ 'khyal tshig gang yang smra mi bya// ci zhig mi bya zhe na// phra ma srog 
25a7(rgyud 'grel): chags 'tshe ba dang // gtam gzhan rnams ni brnyas pa dang // rgyu dang phrag dog nga rgyal dang // rku dang g.yo ni bya ba min// ci zhig sba bar bya zhe na// rang sngags sngags kyi nor bu dang // chang dang rdzas kyi 'du ba dang // bden dngos 
25a8(rgyud 'grel): spyod dang grol ba dang // dngos grub mtshan ma sba bar bya// ci zhig mchod par bya zhe na// byis pa nad pa bud med rgan// dman dang mgon med sman pa dang // bsnyen gnas dka' thub kyis nyon mongs// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dag 
25b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang mchod// ci zhig tshim par bya zhe na// slob dpon med dang pha ma dang // lha dang zhing gi bdag po dang // dur khrod pa yi 'byung po dang // mkha' 'gro ma rnams tshim par bya// ci zhig bsgom par bya zhe na// dkon mchog gsum dang / 
25b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bdag/ phyag rgya ye shes rang gi ngos// cha bcas pa dang cha med pa// bla ma sngags kyang bsgom par bya// ci zhig gzhom par bya zhe na// chags dang gti mug de bzhin sman// le lo de bzhin mi dga' dang // dad pa med
25b3(rgyud 'grel): dang de bzhin brkam// dbang po'i gdon yang gzhom par bya// ci zhig rmongs par bya zhe na// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang // sdang dang phra ma can dang gdug/ rgyal po 'khor dang sdig can dang // mi bsrun dag kyang rmongs
25b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// dam tshig 'di dag bsrung bar bya// bsrungs nas dngos grub gter bar byed// dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa ni// khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang // byang chub sems kyang btang mi 
25b5(rgyud 'grel): bya// gnod par byed la byang sems bskyed// rdo rje'i dbun la bsnyen bkur bya// dad pa med pa rab tu rmod// slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya// zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te// bla ma la ni yang yang dbul// dngos 
25b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i khyad par gang dag gang // mnyes phyir de la dbul bar bya// de bzhin bza' ba'i bye brag rnams// 'phangs pa med par dbul bar bya// gal te de la brnyas gyur na// sangs rgyas thams cad brnyas dang mtshungs// 
25b7(rgyud 'grel): dus min 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni// glen pa dgra dang rkun po dang // de bzhin gdon dang rims kyis thebs// rgyal po'i cha dadang pra men dang // me dang chu dang stag dang dug/ bsang nas sems can dmyal bar ltung // sems ni khro bar mi 
25b8(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing // nam yang shes rab nyams mi bya// rtag tu khyod ni da ltar bsrungs// zhes brjod par bya'o// slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// khro bo brgyad kyi/ 
26a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par dkyil 'khor bzhengs te/ thog mar sa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin rdzogs par byas la/ de nas sta gon gyi 
26a2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga ji ltar rigs par byas la/ de nas thig dang tshon gyi cho ga mo nor bar/ rdzogs par byas la bum pa dgu la lha so so'i mtshan ma gdab dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa ser po bri/ lte ba ljang gu/ rtsibs 'chan dmar po mu khyud dkar po 
26a3(rgyud 'grel): la rdo rje ra ba nag por bya'o// gru chang ljang gur bya/ sgo rigs dang 'dra ba la me ri dang / rdo rje'i ra ba mdzes pas bskor ba bri bar bya'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i mtshan ma bri/ rtsibs la khro bo brgyad kyi 
26a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'o// go rims ma nor bar bri bar bya'o// de nas bum pa rnams lha so so'i gnas su bzhag ste mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// so so'i bum pa la khro bo so so'i phyag rgya bcing / spyan drangs la sngags kyi gnyis su med par bstims 
26a5(rgyud 'grel): la// de nas ye shes sems dpa' dang gnyis su med par bsre bar byas la de dag gi sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan dkyil 'khor gyi bi d+hi nas 'byung ba bzhin gsal bar bya'o// lha so so'i thugs ka nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng
26a6(rgyud 'grel): naninyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyi bar na sngags so so'i rang sgra dang bcas pas dmigs la dbus kyi gtso bo rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa/ shar mtha' yas/ shar lho bdud rtsi 'khyil ba/ lhor gnod mdzes/ lho nub du khro bo mngon mtho/ 
26a7(rgyud 'grel): nub tu rta mgrin/ nub byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ byang du gtum po// byang shar du gshin rje/ sgo rnams su sgom gzhan dang 'dra'o// de ltar so sor bum pa'i nang du gsal bar bskyed la/ sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis khrus 
26a8(rgyud 'grel): mam mi gang sa ma mas pa sa pa sa/ 'i gas gas kyi dpa sa ng+gA tha sa ba mas sa 
26b1(rgyud 'grel): mams mang bas pa masams pa 'gas da mas pams ma darayang dang gang rang ma sa mamam ya thamamapa ma mamamamasas mam sam sas mamamamasas mas sam mamasas sa 
26b2(rgyud 'grel): rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ oM ma tha ma tha badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM d+hur d+hA na badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM da ha da ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM d+hA ra d+hA ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM d+ha ra ya d+hA ra ya badz+ra hU~M phaT/ 
26b3(rgyud 'grel): oM d+hA ru na d+ha ru na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM ts+tshin dats+tshin da badz+ra hUM phaT/ ces bum pa re re la stong phrag ro ba zlas te/ brgya brgya'i ba ra du pA dza l-I lnga dbul lo// ting nge 'dzin gyi lha 'od du'u chu dang gnyis su med par bsre bar bya'o// 
26b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid las 'od 'phros pas rang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par bya'o// de nas dbang bskur ba'i cho ga nas 'byung ba bzhin du bskur ro// bkra shis gsol/ bgegs rnams las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir chus brab pa dang / 
26b5(rgyud 'grel): rma bya'i spros bya ba pa dang / me long gis bye ba dang / dur bas brdeg par bya'o// sarba gra he swA hA/ sarba du swab swA hA/ sarba b+h+r-i kalpa swA hA/ sarba dz+wa re swA hA/ de ltar 'di dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur nas nad dang gdon la 
26b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// khro bo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad kyi rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal 
26b7(rgyud 'grel): lo// lha mo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pas sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par lha mo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te/ sa mchog dang sta gon la sogs pa rdzogs par bya 
26b8(rgyud 'grel): ste// stegs bu gru bzhi tshad dang ldan pa la thig btab la/ tshon dbye ste/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po la lte ba sngon po pad+ma bcas pa mu khyud ser po la/ a dkar po bskor ba khyams dang sgo rigs dang 'dra ba bri ba'o// bum 
26b9(rgyud 'grel): pa dgu rgyan rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa la gtso bo nas brtsams te/ lha so so'i phyag mtshan gur kum dang mtshal ba sres la gdab po// sgo bzhi la seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi btsugs la dar le ba rgan gyi cod pan gdags so// 
27a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha mo dang gtso bo dang de dag so so'i sngags dang / phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nas 'byung ba bzhin/ spyan drangs la so so'i bum pa'i nang du bzhugs su gsol te/ lte ba'i bum pa las rdo rje 
27a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'joms su mdog sngon po phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar bum pa 'dzin pa/ bum pa'i kha sna tshogs rdo rjes bcad pa/ sku la rat+na'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dbul don yod grub pas brgyan par bsgom 
27a3(rgyud 'grel): shar du pad ma la mu tig dkar pos phyag gnyis thugs kar dpal be'u 'dzin pa'o// shar lhor 'joms byed dkar mo 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// lhor rgyas pa sngon mo phyag gnyis pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lho nub du rnam rgyal sngon 
27a4(rgyud 'grel): po phyag gnyis sngags gi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// rub tu lha mo dkar sham dmar mo phyag gnyis gdugs 'dzin pa'o// nub byang du mdangs can dmar mo phyag gnyis gser gyi bum pa 'dzin pa'o// byang du yid gzhungs ma 
27a5(rgyud 'grel): lja ser phyag na drang bsdams pa'o// byeng shar du yid bzangs ma ldang ser phyag gnyis na g.yung drung 'khyil pa bsdams pa'o// lha mo de dag kyang rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa'o// dbul don yod grub pa'am 
27a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'joms kyis brgyan pa'o// las dang rdo rje nges par rdzogs pa rnams rnam par bsgom par bya'o// de nas de dag gi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du A li'i phreng ba las so so'i sngags kyi rang sgras drag par dmigs 
27a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin du so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas la/ de nas bdag nyid khrus byas/ 
27a8(rgyud 'grel): la/ gos sar pagyon te bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o// de yang bum par lha so so'i thugs ka'i sngags kyi rang sgra dang / phyi rol du 'byung ba sna tshogs pa'i rang sgra dang / bdag nyid kyis brjod pa'i rang spa dang gsum pa dmigra/ 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): oM ba ti s+thi ra badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM su ti s+thi ra badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM pra tis+thi ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM a pra ti badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM a mo g+ha badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM e hi badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM shI g+h+raM badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM d+ha sa bya badz+ra hU~M phaT/ ces bum pa re/ 
27b2(rgyud 'grel): la brgya rtsa brgyad pral te/ mchod pa lnga'i rdzas rdo rje'i chus bsang gtor byas te dbul ba dang / gtso bo dang lha mo brgyad spyan drangs te/ so so'i spyan drang ba dang / bzhugs su gsol ba dang / phyag btsal ba dang / bstod pa 
27b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de ltar rdzogs nas phyogs skyong rnams dang bgegs rnams kyi gtor ma btang bstod par bya ste/ rnam par rjes su dran par bya'o// de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / chu dang / cod pan 
27b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i dbang bskur la/ bA liM sgra sna tshogs pas btang ngo // de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/ bkra shis gsol/ bla ma la yon dbul lo// lha mo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba/ dpal mar me mdzad 
27b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa bo// dam tshig 
27b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas/ sa stegs gru gsum me long gi ngos ltar byas la/ thig gdab ste dbus lte ba mu khyud kyis bsor la lte ba ljang gu mu khyud dbang po sna tshogs pad+mas bskor ba/ thu chang 
27b7(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu bar khyams gnyis pa dkar ser lho dang / sgo khyung du bcas pa bris la/ mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa la g+hi haM gi mtshan rdo rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pa btab pa las thams cad pa'i bum pa la sku dkar gyi sna tshogs 
27b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bris la byang du bzhag/ pU dza ji ltar 'byor pa dang bA liM bsham/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcings la mthe bong bsgrengs la srin lag sbyar te mdzub mo phyis nas/ nas gang gi ma reg pa byas la mthe'u chung blang la/ oM badz+ra dz+wa lA na 
28a1(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM phaT/ ces pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas bum pa'i nang du paM dang maM las pad ma nyi ma brtsegs pa'i steng du hUM las rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang ser phyag gnyis kyis gser gyi bum pa rdorje/ 
28a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gram phyogs gcig med pas kha bcad pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ sul rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi sa brgyan pa/ zhal yid tsam khro ba yan lag sbrul rigs bzhis 
28a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa bskyed do// de'i thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas nas/ oM badz+ra dz+nyA na hUM swA hA/ hUM zhes brjod pas ye shes sems dpa' ci 'dra ba kra ba'i gdan la bskyed pa de nyid la mchod pa dang gtor ma bya'o// 
28a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i thugs ka'i hUM la dmigs te/ bdag nyid khrus bya ba dang / gos rje ba la sogs pa bya ste/ snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bsdus pa la stong phrag gcig shin tu bsdus pa la stong phrag bzlas te/ slob ma la bsrung skud gdags 
28a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / dam tshig sdom pa 'bogs pa la sogs pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug/ gzungs nyi shu rtsa gcig klag tu gzhug/ de nas lha ngo bstan/ dbugs 'byung / gzengs bstod/ dbang bskur/ lag tu rdo rje dang 
28a6(rgyud 'grel): dril bu'i sgras dkyil 'khor bskor/ dbang rdzogs par byin la gos rje zas kyi rnal 'byor bya'o// de yang mchod pa dbul ba dang gtor ma btang / dkyil 'khor bsdu/ bkra shis gsol/ slob ma la ches bshad/ slob 
28a7(rgyud 'grel): mas bla ma la yon dbul/ bden pa'i tshig brjod do// dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i bdud rtsi bum pa'i cho ga dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 
28a8(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yab yum gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas/ 
28b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yab yum gyi dkyil 'khor ba khengs te/ sa stegs gru bzhi pa me long gi ngos ltar byas la thig btab la tshon dgye ste/ dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa dkar po// mu khyud ser po mdung rtse gsum/ 
28b2(rgyud 'grel): pas bskor ba de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug pa dmar po mu khyud ser po// phur bus bskor ba gru chad ljang khu mu khyud dang bcas pa tha ma me ris bskor ba/ grwa rnams su bum pa bzang po bri bar bya'o// de ltar bris la dkyil 'khor gyi 
28b3(rgyud 'grel): tha ma rnams su shu gu brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bskor ba gzugs so// de dag kyang ras kyi phud pa sgril mas spel lo// mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa gnyis la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'khor lo dang pad ma'i steng du bzhag go//
