144b5(rgyud 'grel): phal cher ma bstan kyang phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba dang / de kho na nyid bcu la 'jug pa dag las gtso bor bstan to// gcig tu dngos grub thams cad ni gsang sngags kyi lha dang de kho na nyid la rag lus pa yin/ 
144b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ de dag rnam par nyams na zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur bas/ bla mas bshad pa dang rgyud kyi khyad par cung zad dpyad pa las khong du chud par bya'o// de ltar rim pa 'dis lha nyid kyi su/ 
144b7(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bya'o// de nas rang gi lha nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas snying ga dang / smin mtshams dang / mgrin pa dang / dpung mgo rnams su byin gyis brlab po// de nas rin po che du ma las byas

145a1(rgyud 'grel): skyon dang bral ba pad+ma dang / ut+pal la sogs pa'i me tog gis rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i bya'i tshogs mang po lding ba bsam par bya'o// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags ni bi malan 
145a2(rgyud 'grel): de'i dbus sa da ri rgyal po bsam par \u0f7f/ thab ni sangs pani na pa ci'i bamags kyi zang pas brgyan pa/ thamams pa lanigs dmas byas pa/ lal ni dAl las byas pa/

145b3(rgyud 'grel): su me tog dang // spos kyi chu ni gtsang ba yis// mchod yon cho ga bzhin bshams la/ bdug spos kyis ni rab tu bdug/ de la zhi ba dang dngos grub gnyis la ni nas dang 'o ma'i mchod yon dbul bar bya'o//

149b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyab du bzhag nas srin lag dang mthe bos las thams cad la bgrang bar bya ste/ sngags brjod pa'i mjug tu nor bu re re las bgrang bar bya'o// las drag po rnams ni mdzub mos bya'o// rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i zla ba'i 
149b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang / lha'i thugs kha'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang gis bzlas par bya'o// gsang sngags kyi yi ge rim pa bzhin bkod nas mngon sum dang 'dra bar blta ste/ rdo rje'i tshig gam shub bu'i sbyor bas ha cang mi myur mi dal 
149b3(rgyud 'grel): bar gsang sngags kyi yi ge brjod cing bzlas par bya'o// de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'di skad ces/ klag pa skyon med byas nas su/ gsang sngags yi ge dag pa la// mnyam par bzhag ste rtse gcig tu// bzlas brjod dus 
149b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum dag tu bya// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig yin te// so dang mchu ni legs sbyar te// lce rtse ha cang mi bskyed pa// sgra spangs pa ni rdo rje'i tshig/ cho ga kun la sbyar bar bya'o// shub bu'i bzlas brjod

171a1(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum 'khor ba'i nga rgyal skyon bral nas// rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan thob gyur cig/ nub phyogs rnam dag pad+ma chos kyi dbyings// 'dod chags skyon bral

171a4(rgyud 'grel): pa grub gyur cig/ chos sgra rnam par dag pa'i skyon bral nas// legs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs par shog/ chu rnam lngas su zlas gsal ba// sku mchog rnam dag lta bas mi ngoms pa//

176a4(rgyud 'grel): sems rtogs yul las 'das// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// thugs kyi mchod rten 
176a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rje sa dgongs nas bzhis su gsol// bla med mchod rten cha lugs ni// rin chen 'bar ba'i sred rtse nas// tsin d+ha ma Ni ye shes bzhi// bkra shis 
176a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas// chu bo gar+b+ha 'ibi rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su
176a7(rgyud 'grel): gsol// yid kyi mchod rten cha lugs ni// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtshab 'jing // byang chub sems kyi mchod rten spyi// snang zhing stod la stong zhing gsal// yid kyi mchod rten thams cad la// chu bo 
176a8(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhis su gsol// rang bzhin mchod rten ye shes sku// thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmad po 
176b1(rgyud 'grel): tshe// mtshan ma'i sdug bsngal yongs bsal bas// sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// chu bo gad+hA'i rgun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// rang bzhin 
176b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten thams cad la// bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// sprul pa'i mchod rten ting 'dzin sku// byams shing snyoms pa kun gyi mgon// thugs rje chen po skyo dub 
176b3(rgyud 'grel): med// nub byang rgyal po mig nad sel// dpal tshogs bkra shis gzhal yas 'dir// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyan bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyan yang mi 'chad de// sprul pa'i mchod rten thams cad la// bla med mchod pa 'di

176b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// 'phags pa'i mchod rten la bstod pa// rang 'byung 'dren pa dpa' bo lha yi 
176b7(rgyud 'grel): lha// bcom ldan shAka thub sku gdung ring bsrel snod// 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod gnas mchog bzhugs pa// bar rim ri rab lta bu'i khri 'phang la// bum rten pad+ma bum bzang snying po ni// tshogs 
176b8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yid bzhin sku// phyag 'tshal mchod pas brgya byin lus dag cing // mthar gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku thob pa// yon tan tshogs kyi sku gdung mthu chen bzhugs// bum pa 
177a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs legs srog shing zang brtan la// 'khor lo gdugs breng rim pas 'gebs pa'i steng // 'od stong nyi dbyibs char khabs gdugs bris te// zla ba dril bu cod pan 'jig rten/

177a7(rgyud 'grel): bral ba srung ba'i ngos kyi them skas mdzes// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ba dan swa// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i chu srin rgyal mtshan grags// mi 'jigs bzhi yi rdo rang seng ge brjerjod// 'di 'dra'i dam chos 
177a8(rgyud 'grel): mtshar rmad kyi rnams// thabs mkhas thugs rjes mchod rten tshul du sprul// nam mkha'i khams la chen bkye ji bzhin du// yon tan khyad par kha dog dbyibs su bsgyur// dpal gnas rin chen 'byung gnas 
177b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po pa// dus gsum rgyal ba'i mchod rten sku gdung tshul// dpal 'byung ka ni ka dang rab 'byung tshul// bsod nams phung pos yul khams byin chags shing // sangs rgyas sprul pa'i phrin las rdzogs

181b7(rgyud 'grel): uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'dis gdugs lta bur 'khyil bar gur kum gyis bri/ de'i sngags laM/ na maHsarba ti thA ga tA nAM/ ma hA tsin d+ha ma Ni dz+wa la na sA ga ra/ gam b+hI re A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ A yun+na/ 
181b8(rgyud 'grel): ra/ A yun+na ra/ san+na ra/ san+na ra/ k+Sha Na k+Sha Na/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi NaM/ k+Shu rbuk+ShA NA/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ye/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ta/ ma hA b+hu ba na sA ga re/ saM sho d+ha ya mAn/ sarba pA paM/ bi ma le/ dza ya dza yi/ 
182a1(rgyud 'grel): dza ya la ba d+he/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ wo Ta ya wo Ta ya/ bi ga te/ A ba ra Ne/ b+ha ya ha ri Ne hUM trAM hUM/ mri d+hudaN+Da d+ha re/ a b+ha ya tha te/ uSh+NI Sha bya ba lo ki te/ sa maN+Da mu She/ sa man+ta bya ba/ 
182a2(rgyud 'grel): lo ki te/ mahA mA ye/ mahA pA sha d+ha re/ a me g+ha bi ma le/ A kAraSh+ka a kA ra ShA/ a kaR+Sha D+ha ya/ A ka Da D+hA ya/ b+hAr b+hU ra/ saM b+hA ra/ saM b+ha ra/ in dri ya/ bi sho d+ha ni/ b+hU Shi ta b+hu dze/ mahA mu drA baM 
182a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ yadza la/ sid rnaMs da N+Di g+ha r+b+he k+sha d+ha bab+hadz+nyA bo d+ha na brti ni/ sa btin/ sa bad+ha / ni/ d+hin/ d+hi / bAn ne/ nga tang / mam sarba pA pa/ sarba te thAg te/ bral d+haH/

182a6(rgyud 'grel): dar+N+Ne sAhA/ yaM ma dA te swA hA/ saM ha ra NI swAhA/ saM b+hA ra Ni sAd+hA/ san d+hA ra Ne sA hA/ pra ti sa ra Ni swA hA/ oM dz+nya ba te swAhA/ te dze ba ti swA hA/ oM dza ya ba ti swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu dri a d+hiSh+Tha na ed+hiSh+Ti te k+ShaH/

182a8(rgyud 'grel): du khru gang lhag tsam la/ gzungs gnyis ka rdzogs par bri zhing 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan par byas te/ dbus kyi mchod rten ring bsrel can/ de la me reg tu gdags/ de nas dkyil 'khor de'i steng

191b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs par bzhag go/ rma bya'i sgro lngas khyab par bya'o// mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o// cho ga 'di ldan cig byas na bskul pa 'bum du byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib
191b5(rgyud 'grel): pa med par 'gyur ro// kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / dam tshig la rnam par blta ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bris la mchod

191b7(rgyud 'grel): nyin zhag re la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o// de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogs su spos kyi dkyil 'khor bya/ nyi ma logs su me tog gis gtor ro// a ka ru dang / du ru ka'i du bas

197a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur na ye shes kyi lha mdun du bkug la phyag dang mchod bstod byas nas thugs ka gnyis su oM la sngags kyis bskor ba dmigs nas zhal dang lte bar mgal me 'khor bas rang gzhan thams cad kyi

197b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa ti te pa tra a pa rA dzi ta ba li ta bi d+hi nA maHbod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag

197b8(rgyud 'grel): yigadon dang 'byung po'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor gro bzhir dgod par bya'o// de nas g.yos kyi rnam pa ni// rag sha dang ni bo de co// lung thang dang ni lha yi mig/ phreng ba za ba rnams la sbyin// 'bras 
198a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chang rgun chang la sogs pa// zas su sems 'phrog rnams la sbyin// 'o ma zho dang kha ra ni// srog rnams 'phrog la sbyin par bya// shing tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa// 'bras bu za ba 
198a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la sbyin// bong rtsi zas skyugs za la'o// bdug pa za ba spos sna tshogs// mnga' gsum sbyar ba mngal zala'o// bcos dang rjen pa sha sna tshogs// sha za ba la sbyin par bya'o// sbrang rtsi mchil ma 'thung

198a4(rgyud 'grel): lo tog za ba rnams la sbyin// thang skyes chu skyes me tog rnams// me tog za pa rnams la sbyin// la phug srog btsang la sogs pa// mi gtsang zab rnams la sbyin// tshil ni rul dang ma rul ba// tshil ba/

198a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin// khrag rnag mang po ji snyed pa// zas su zag 'thung rnams la sbyin// sha rnams bcos pa'i zhag rnams ni// zas su zhag za rnams la sbyin// bu ram shing kun sbyar ba ni// btsas pa za ba rnams la

198b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin gyis snod 'degs pa'i tshul du byas nas/ oMdz+nyA na oM ba lo gi te/ sa man+ta pa ra na ras+thi ta b+ha ba sa ma ya/ ma hA ma na~M du ru du ru/ hri da ya dza la ni b+h+rUM zhes brjod pas mgron rnams kyis so sor thob cing

198b8(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste/ b+hu bcom ldan gdugs dkar 'khor bcas rnams// tshur gshegs 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol// mchod yon zhal bsil bzhes nas kyang // pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/

202a8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin pas zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// gza' yi gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang // ltas ngan mtshan dan 
202b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlog tu gsol// sa bdag rtul ba 'khor dang bcas pa la batho ba ni/ sa bdag rdul po pag sa ko can// sa bdag tu pha nams dang // be snga lag rten cing spya dang // rlud kun 'as dang patal// sa bdag 
202b2(rgyud 'grel): brtan ma la sogs la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su skabs za zhes bya ba// b+ha yi sgong la sogs pa'i// srid pa'i rgyu dang sbyar ba 'di/ 
202b3(rgyud 'grel): sa bdag 'khor bcas thams cad la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// sa bdag gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang // tshe dang dbang 
202b4(rgyud 'grel): thang spel du gsol// lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ lha min rgyal po thag bzangs ris// rab gsal dang ni zhi ba'i mchog/ thag pa sri dang khra chen po// dus kyi 'khor dang dri med po/ 
202b5(rgyud 'grel): lha min rgyal po thams cad la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su rnag za zhes bya la// sha su ma rus pa la sogs pa// rgyu dang rkyen du bsags pa 'di/ 
202b6(rgyud 'grel): lha min 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// lha min gdon tshogs zhi ba dang // lo skag zla sgeg
202b7(rgyud 'grel): bdud sgeg dang // khram sgeg la sogs pa zlog tu gsol// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dang // chos ldan chos skyong chos bzangs dang // lha min 
202b8(rgyud 'grel): phung byed la sogs pa// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su ngar snabs za ba la// de po'i ngar sgor sbyar ba dang // mi 'am ci'i rgyal po 'khor
203a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// gzhan gyi sbyor ba ngan pa dang // bsam ngan 
203a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bzlog tu gsol// mkha' 'gro ma 'khor dang bcas pa la ba sngo ba ni// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs de bi ra// ha pad+ma dang su ka ri// bi hi bi dang bi ma ka/ be bo ka dang ka ra ti ka/ ba ka ra ta dang mu ha ka/ 
203a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro chen mo thams cad la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su khrag 'thung zhes bya la// khrag sna brgya'i gtor ma 'di// mkha' 'gro chen mo
203a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// mkha' 'gro'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang // mdangs 'phrog thams cad
203a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlog tu gsol// ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la bsngo ba ni// ma mo chen mai dza mi ka/ rdo rje gzhon nu lu gu rgyud// pad+ma'i mig dang rig gser phreng // rdo rje shugs ldan rgya ldan ma// rdo rje pad+mo'i 'od 
203a6(rgyud 'grel): phreng ma// ma mo'i gdon tshogs thams cad la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mo ches pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su zhag za zhes bya la// zhag dang bcud du sbyar ba 'di// ma mo 
203a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// ma mo'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang // srog 'phrog sdug bsngal 
203a8(rgyud 'grel): bzlog tu gsol// nam mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni// nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po la// gser mig can dang yan lag 'du// rna bdud dang ni 'jigs par 'gro// 'dab brgya de dang ni gtsug 
203b1(rgyud 'grel): bud can// shugs ldan bzang dang yan lag ldan// nam mkha' lding gi 'khor bcas la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su btsas pa za ba la// bu ram 
203b2(rgyud 'grel): shing kun la sogs pa'i// bcud dang bdud rtsi sbyar ba 'di// mkha' lding rgyal po 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad
203b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi// mkha' lding gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang // tshe yi bar chod skyab tu gsol// lto 'bye'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni// lto 'phye'i rgyal po chen po ni// mgyogs chen dang ni du ba can// la ba
203b4(rgyud 'grel): can dang hu ta ka/ shu ba ra ka sna sna bzangs dang // dpung bzangs dang ni 'jigs chen dang // lto 'phye'i rgyal po la sogs pa// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 
203b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di// zas su dri za zhes bya la// ga pur gur kum sug smel dang // li shi dzA ta la sogs pa'i// dri dang sman du sbyar ba 'di// lto 'phye 'khor dang bcas pa la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ 
203b6(rgyud 'grel): khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// lto 'phye'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang // gdon gyi bar chad bzlog tu gsol// srin po 'khor dang bcas bal bsngo ba ni/ rnal 'byor 
203b7(rgyud 'grel): srin mo nag mo dang // sbrul mig nag mo gnod sbyin mo// be tshon nag mo la sogs la// phyag 'tshal bskyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// cha dam mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ zas su lhag ma za ba la// kun gyi 
203b8(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma'i tshogs sbyar 'di// srin mo 'khor btsas thams cad la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyod la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// ma mo srin mo'i 
204a1(rgyud 'grel): gdon tshogs dang // mi nad phyugs nad bzlog tu gsol// klu'i tshegs 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ gang+gA'i lha dang sin d+hA'i lha// byams ldan lha dang dbyangs can lha/ 
204a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba can dang ya mu ta// kun gyi lha dang mgyogs chen lha// mtsho lteng lha la sogs pa la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul// cha de ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su stor khung bab 'thung la// 
204a3(rgyud 'grel): chu sna brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni// bcud dang rtsi ldan sbyar ba 'di// chu klung sna tshogs 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams 
204a4(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// chu klung gnas pa'i bgegs bdon dang // tshe srog bair chod bzlog tu gsol// phyogs bzhi'i bgegs chen 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ sher phyogs khams kyi bdag po dang // lho 
204a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs sprin gyi sgron ma dang // nub phyogs bgegs rgyal rdo rje dang // byang phyogs bi nA ya ka la// phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bral// tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di// zas su mi 
204a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsang za ba la// khrag dang sha sna sbyar ba ni// bgegs chen bzhi po 'khor bcas la// bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig/ khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni// bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi// 
204a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi'i bgegs tshogs zhi ba dang // bsam sbyor dran pa bzlog tu gsol// 'byung po ma lus khyed rnams kun// so sor gtor ma phul ba 'di// rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas su// / 
204a8(rgyud 'grel): rang rangadaphyogs su legs par bzhugs nas kyang // rang ge sas mdzub pa shas gnyen 'dun dang // nang me dmag dang dpung bcas wAn t+t+ra// gtor ma ma tig du dang badrag par rabacas/ 
204b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag gsol zhing legs par bsnams nas kyang // bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// ces brjod par bya'o// de nas b+ho 'bag bzhi byas pa'i mdun du skor bzhi drangs la/ de b+h+yo sngags kyis
204b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngags te phyogs bzhir bskyal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'khor bcas la mchod pa dang / rgyud kyi bstod pa la sogs pas bstod nas bdag dang yon pa dag 'khor bcas kyis me tog thogs la 
204b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan nam// sku dang dkyil 'khor bcas pa la yang bstod pa byed cing bskor ba bya/ nad gdon zhi ba'i gsol ba gdab/ bzod par gsol ye shes pa gshegs/ dam tshig babasdu/ gtor ma 
204b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod byed kyi phyogs su gtang la// bkra shis brjod par bya'o// de ni mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / b+had ka dang / pur ka dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la sogs pa 
204b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// char chu yang dus su 'bab pa dang / rtsi bcud dang / lo tog la sogs pa'i 'bru thams cad rgyas pa dang / mi phyugs thams cad 'bel ba dang / mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro//

204b7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon tsan+da go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / zo ling gi gtsug lag khang du dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// / zhe / ya nagatan lngas ga ga/ gzha / 
204b8(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha sitA ta ba tre nA mA pa rA dzi ta d+hA ra Ni sI d+ha na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis/ 
205a1(rgyud 'grel): mthub pa byar ba zlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// mthong dang ma mthong la grol ba'i// gdugs dkar yum la phyag 'tshal te/ 
205a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gzhan don de thob bya'i phyir// lo 'dab tsam zhig gsal bar bya// de la 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ gnas dben zhing yid dang mthun par dang po maN+Dal dang 
205a3(rgyud 'grel): shams pathus \u0f7fte/ lusaHmjugs nas// gsugs pa gas sa gnas pa bya'o// des dang gsuM gang thub thang du sa da dbubs pas/ des pa du 'grus pa 
205a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can dmigs te/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du bya'o// de nas tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms te/ 
205a5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o// de ltar stong pa nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i oM dkar po bsams te/ de nyid la phyogs bcur 'phros pas 'gro ba'i don bya ste/ tshur 'dus 'dus pa las
205a6(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar po oM gyis mtshan par gyur te/ de las 'od zer lha mo'i u dang bcas pa 'phros pas 'jig rten thams cad du nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las dkrol te chur 'dus pas/ 'phags pa gdugs
205a7(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po gnyis gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa/ sprul pa'i dbu stong phyag stong mnga' ba/ spyan bye ba phrag brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo// dbu la mi phyed rdo rje 'bar ba'i 
205a8(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rtags can/ sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa/ bdag dang gzhan 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te gnas par bsams 
205b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ mchod pa'i tshogs rnams byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs par bya'o// de nas mdun gyi nam mkhar bruM las ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang sems kyi 'byor pa'i rgyad dang ldan par bsgoms pa'i nang du ser 
205b2(rgyud 'grel): ge la sogs pa'i gdan rnams babyung ba la/ spyan drang ba ni snying ga ma gyi 'idakyis bskul te dmigs pa rnams mchod yan gyis bzhugasas sol bar bya'o// de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'adu 
205b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang / sprul pa'i tshogs rnams gsal bar dmigs te/ gzhung las byung ba'i phyag rgya dang bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa'i tshogs kyis 
205b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod do// de nas gsol ba btab stebazlas pa ni bdag dang ye shes kyi thugs kar/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzlas pa'i yi ge mu tig rdog po lta bung bsams te/ spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas 
205b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'i spyod grangs te bzlas par bya'o// de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs shing sems can gyi don dran pas bzlas pa bya'o// de la lam gtong 
205b6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dod na bzlas pa yid kyis 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phul te/ bdag las kyi lha mos 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ bzod par gsol zhing dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngos 
205b7(rgyud 'grel): nas gshegs su gsol lo// de nas lus bsrung bar bya ste ldang bar bya'o// langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o// rtag tu 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo dran par bya'o// phyag 
205b8(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bar dmigs shing 'byung po'i kha zas spangs te bsgrub par bya'o// bsrung ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / bzlog pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba dang / dmag dpung 
206a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhom pa dang / dngos grub bsgrub pa dang / seng ba bsrung ba dang / sri'u gso ba dang / gtor ma btang ba dang / mdzen gso ba dang / 'jigs pa bskyab pa kun dang po'i phan yon 
206a2(rgyud 'grel): las 'byung ba ltar thams cad bya'o// bdag 'dra blo dman so so skye bo yis// 'phags pa mchog la chu yi thigs tsam bstod// 'di las bskyed pa'i bsod nams gang byung bas// bdag dang sems can kun gyi 
206a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog thob shog/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/ slob dpon tsan dra go mis mdzad pa

206a5(rgyud 'grel): lte ba la bsrung bar bya ba'i ming bsrung tshig dang bcas pa bris te/ rtsibs brgyad po dag la ni/ oM ri Shi ga na nas aSh+Ta na ma'i bar du so sor bris te/ yang bsrung ba'i tshogs dang bcas par ro// gnyis pa la ni tad+ya thA/ oM 
206a6(rgyud 'grel): nas hUM dzu bAn d+ha'i bar du sde tshan brgyad du dgod par bya'o// rim pa gsum par ni zhi bar byed pa'i rig sngags/ ted+ya thA/ hUM nas ma ma'i bar du dgod par bya'o// rim pa bzhi par ni/ thams cad 'joms pa'i rig 
206a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags oM a si tAn lArga nas pi sa na ya'i bar du bsrung ba'i tshig dang bcas par dgod par bya'o// de ltar bris pa de bum pa 'am man+t+ral steng du bzhag nas/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bya ste/ 'khor lo'i 
206a8(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi yi ge las 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can 'khor bcas bskyed par bya'o// de nas mdun du gzhal yas khang bsams te/ ye shes kyi lha tshogs spyan drangs mchod pa bya ste/ gzungs nas 'byung bas 
206b1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba btab la/ bkrus pa brgya'am stong ngam ci tsam 'tsham par bya'o// de nas 'khor la yang mchod cing tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang legs ldan la sogs pa la gtor ma phul te/ gsol ba btab 
206b2(rgyud 'grel): nas rang ngam gzhan skyes pa 'am bud med de phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas/ yungs kar dang bcas pas lus sam mgul du btags na mes mi tshugs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan no// 
206b3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon tsan+da ge bis badzad pa'i bkrung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs so// / bdag nyid bsten bathob pas 'khrul 'khor 'ching bar 'dod na/ dur khrod kyi ras la khrag dang dug dang lan tshwa dang / ske che 
206b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i khubs 'khor lo mu khyud gnyis la bkor ba bris te/ nang ma'i lte ba la ba grub bya'i ming sa bon gyi yi ge bris pa'i phyi rol tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM nas hUM druM ban d+ha'i bar du bris pa'am mthar che ge mo mA ra ya 
206b5(rgyud 'grel): phaT ces bri'o// rim pa gnyis pa la thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags/ bA ra ya dang bcas par dgod do// de nas grog mkhar gyis dang / b.lang gi lci ba dang / dgra'i rkang rjes kyis bgegs kyi rku par
206b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gram gyis la gzugs brnyan byas te/ de'i snying gar 'khrul 'khor bcug ste dong gru gsum du gzhug go// de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bya ste/ 'khor lo bsgrub byar ba sems pa'i rten la
206b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa kun bkug cing bcug par bsams la/ tshangs pa dang dbang po dang legs ldan drag po la sogs pa rnams la gtor ma byin te/ gsol ba btab nas/ bzlas pa ni phyag rgya'i tsho gas 
206b8(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas bsgrub bya bkug cing / bkug nas bcings par bsams te/ de nas ling ga 'gul ba dang ldeg pa dang / g.yo ba la sogs pa byung nas thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags kyis rig 
207a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags bcad phur pas gdab par bya'o// tha mar sman ma rlung la 'char ba 'am mnan par bya'o// yang na ling ga la bzlas pa bya ste/ chu mig gam/ sbyin sreg gam/ 
207a2(rgyud 'grel): sa gter ram/ ri rtser gtad bya'o// 'khrul 'khor rdzogs so// // dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / ngag bzlog pa ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ phyag rgya'i tsho gas dang bcas 
207a3(rgyud 'grel): par bsgoms nas/ mdun du 'chi bdag gnas par bsgoms te/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis de la bsnun pa'i sbyor ba bya ste/ tshung 'dus pas bdag ye shes kyi bdud rtsis lus la phan btags par bsams te/ 
207a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'joms pa bzlas par bya'o// rag bzlog pa ni grog mkhar gyis dang / ba lang gi lci ba la bsgrub bya'i ming gzugs byas la/ de'i snying gar sngar gyi 'khrul 'khor bris pa'i mthar che ge mo mA 
207a5(rgyud 'grel): ra ya ban d+ha ya nan bya ba bcug ste bkod nas bcug nas/ gzugs kyi khar thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar dang phur bus btab ste/ de nas mchod rten rnying pa 'am/ lha khang gi 
207a6(rgyud 'grel): them pa'am/ lam rgya gram ma ma/ bsgrub bya'i yul gyi phyogs su cha tsha'i 'og tu 'am/ yang na rang gi mal 'og tu dong gru gsum pa byas pa 'am/ 'og tu bzhag nas byems bkang ste/ g.yam pa la rdo rje rgya gram 
207a7(rgyud 'grel): bris la mnan pa'i sbyor ba bya'o// de nas tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang / leg ldan drag po la gtor ma byin la/ 'chi ba dag gzhom pa'am che ge mo'i ngag bcings shing che ge mo'i srung ma bdag gi dbang du gyis 
207a8(rgyud 'grel): shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// rang bsrung ba yang thun mong du lha'i nga rgyal gyis bzlas bsgom rtag tu bya ba dang / lus la sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gdags so// bzlog pa'i thabs rdzogs so// 
207b1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ grog mkhar gyis dang / dur khrod kyi thal ba dang / chu bar 'gram tshur 'gram gyi sa la bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/ 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar 
207b2(rgyud 'grel): bris pa'i mthar chag ma ngadabyung ba mang yan na byab bkodade/ de'i snying gar bcu gnas del bdag gi thugs las phyag rgya'i tshogs spros pas pa grub par bya ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnamol bston te/ 
207b3(rgyud 'grel): bkug ste gzugs brnyan la bcug ste/ bcings nas la chas dril ti dres mas dkris la/ thod pa 'am kham phor kha sbyar sar pa ru bcug ste/ tshangs pa dang dbang po dang legs ldan drag po la sogs pa la 
207b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma byin nas 'byung po 'di bdag gi dbang du gyis shig ces bskol lha khang gi them pa 'am/ lam rgya gram mam/ mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og dong gru gsum du bcug la/ bye ma'am tshe mas bkang nas/ 
207b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rgya gram gyi mnan te/ bskal par mi thar bar bsam mo// bgegs gzir ba ni gzugs ba rAd snga ma ltar ram/ 'jag ma la byas te/ 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar byas te/ de'i tha mar che ge mo mA ra ya btags 
207b6(rgyud 'grel): te bris te/ gtor ma snga ltar byin te/ tshangs pa dang dbang po legs ldan la sogs pas gnod par byed pa'i 'byung po 'di tshems shig ces bskul nas/ phyag rgya'i cho gas kyis rang dbang med par snga ma ltar bkug 
207b7(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas/ thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags dang yungs kar/ phur bu dang ral gri dang bcas pas gzir zhing tha mar mnan pa 'am bsreg par bya'o// yang na tha mar mna' chu blud la btang bar bya'o// 
207b8(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba'i thabs rdzogs so// // pha rol gyi dmag dpung gzhom par 'dod na/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas 'khrul 'khor mu khyud gnyis pa snga ma ltar ram/ ras 
208a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar po lta bu la bris pa'i mthar che ge mo'i tshogs dang / de dag gi srung ma'i ming gi mthar ba na d+ha ma nan bya ba bris nas/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis de'i bsrung ma dang / dmag dpung rlung gi dkyil 
208a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis btags nas bstims te/ bcings nas 'thab mtshams su snga ma ltar mnan par bya'o// yang na pha rol gyi dmaga'ong ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan 
208a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi mi thub pa'i gzungs rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro dang mchod pa bya ste/ grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo'am/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so// yang na rin pa 
208a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe'i byang bu'am/ grog 'ab/ shog pu la gzungs 'di zas te ltar ba skyed cing spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa chen po byas nas skor babya/ tshangs pa dang dpeng pa brgya byin la sogs pa la gta ma btang // tshig mo 
208a5(rgyud 'grel): dmag dpung choms shig ces pas kyang bskul te de ltar gzungs du mar bres te spyi gtsug tu gdags pa dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi rtsel btags te/ dmags dpung gi mdun du bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor 
208a6(rgyud 'grel): du bya ste/ nga rgyal dang ldan pa phyag rgya'i tshogs dang tshangs pa dang / dbang po la sogs pas bskor te/ gnas par bsam shing phyar te 'gro bar bya'o// rtag tu mchod cing gsol ba gdab par bya'o// des ni pha 
208a7(rgyud 'grel): rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// dmag dpung gzhom pa'i thabs rdzogs so// / dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na/ gnas yid dang mthun zhing bkra shis par gro ga'am ras la gzungs

208b1(rgyud 'grel): tshachang ngam/ zan la sogs pa gzhag nas/ lha'i rnal 'byor byas te gsol ba btab la/ tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa la gtor ma sbyin te/ yang gsol ba btab nas dngos grub gsol bar dmigs te bsgor/

208b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma sbyin te/ gsol ba btab na bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams kyi stobs kyang dpag tu med pa yang rnyed do// dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so//

208b6(rgyud 'grel): btab nas tshangs pa la sogs pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma byin te/ gzungs 'de brgya'am stong du bzlas brjod bya ba dang / bris te lus sam mgul du brtags nas rtag tu 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can 
208b7(rgyud 'grel): yid la byed pa dang / gsol ba 'debs shing bzlas brjod byas na rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i gdon la sogs pa dang / mdangs za ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gdon tham 
208b8(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis byas pa la sogs pa dang / nad pa dang / rims thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i thabs rdzogs so// / ser ba bsrung ba 'dod pas/ 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar 
209a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad byas te/ tha mar ser ba'i 'byung po mA ra ya ban d+ha ya nan bya ba bkod nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bkug cing bcings nas/ kham phor ram

209a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bzlas te gzhag pa dang / gzhan du yang skor ba dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa la gtor ma byin te/ gsol ba gdab pa dang / snang srid kyi lha 'dre dang / bar snang gi lha dang / gnod sbyin kun dang /

212b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rnal 'byor pa zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed par 'dod pas/ dang par sa gzhi shin tu kha dog dkar ba dag pa la thab khung zlum po rgyar khru gang zabs su khru phyed pa/ kha khyer sor bzhi pa dang ldan 
212b8(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ de la dri dkar pos byug pa dang / me tog dkar po gtong bar bya'o// de yang dbus su pad+ma'i steng du rdo rjes mtshan pa bris te/ kha khyer yang rdo rjes bskor bar bya'o// de nas thab tu bud shing brtsigs pa 
213a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te/ zhi ba'i rdzas til dang mar dang / ku sha dang dung ba dang / nas dang gro dang dkar gsum pang gsum la sogs pa bsags te rang nyid khru 
213a2(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ stan bde ba la pad+ma'i 'dug spangs sam/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis kha shar du bltas te gnas par bya'o// de nas rang nyid lngab thobs pas 'byung ba ltar zhwa'i rnal 'byor

218b4(rgyud 'grel): pas bslus pa'i sems can rnams// rang gi las nyid rnam par smin pa yi// 'dra ba rnam ba'i ri rims nang mi bzad pa// zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod// ji ltar khyod kyis sems can 
218b5(rgyud 'grel): mang po la// thugs rje mchog gis 'gro don nyir bzang nas// srid gsum 'jigs pa che las bsgral gyur cing // sdug bsngal mang po'i nad las thar mdzad ltar// bdag kyang khyod bzhin 'gro ba'i

218b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs so// // / ma lag ga ga tan sa ga gas gang ba ga 'i bab sa tha pa / @#// rgya gang sad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+Thi it+sa ta paM ten+t+ra ma a ba rA dzi ta u pa deka/

219a7(rgyud 'grel): yin no// dmigs pa bcu bzhi ni phyag gi dmigs pa dang / thams cad bzlog pa dang / ri khrod lo ma can nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / bdag bsrung ba dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i che ba dang / 'jigs pa brgyad
219a8(rgyud 'grel): bklog pa dang / gdon chen po nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzlog pa dang / rig sngags gcing pa dang / ma mo brgyad dang / dam tshig can bcu bzhi'i sngags dang / thams cad bzlog pa dang / nad thams cad bsrung /

235a1(rgyud 'grel): sba bya ste/ sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga rdzogs pas 'phags ma gdugs dkar can du bsams te/ tsha tshe'i sa brko ba der btag pa dang / oM AHhUM zhes pa'am/ bkra shis pa'i phyag rgya'i 
235a2(rgyud 'grel): lha mos gang bar byin gyis brlab thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad pa dang / lha mo dang legs ldan la gtor ma byin la gsol ba gdab pa dang / sa bdag la gtor ma byin la bka' sgo ba ste/ 
235a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas ji tsam brko ba'i sa de la seng ldeng la sogs pa'i phur bus phyogs bzhir btab ste/ de yang bstod legs ldan nam/ lha mo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la smad phur bar 'dug par bskyed/ byin gyis brlabasal

235a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra sU tra sa ma ya hUM phaT ces bya ste/ phur ba'i za mtshon skud gyis bskor la rang gi rkang pa gar bzhag par rdo rje ralam lam song bar bsam mo// yang na sngags de thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bya'o//

235b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ de las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i 'od kyi gros chu thams cad khyab ste/ bdud rtsir gyur par bsams te spu'o// de'i sngags oM badz+ra pra marda ya pra marda ya hUM phaT ces byas la spu'o// 
235b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'jim pa de bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgyas bcas la sngags 'di brjod de/ oM suk+Sh+me sukle nu ga te/ shAn+te dan te/ ni ku li/ ni ra ba ra Ne/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya nu ga te/ ya ba daM ya sho dza naM/ 
235b3(rgyud 'grel): d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ d+harma ra dza ya ba shi he/ sarba bud+d+hA ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA nA ya/ a d+hiSh+Thi te sAhA/ zhes brjod pas rang thugs las ye shes 'od zer 'phros pas khams gsum sems can/ 'phags/

293b5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad dang / gzungs dang / rig pa'i mthu dang / mos pa'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las 'byung rgya mtsho thams cad

322a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / tshogs gnyis spel ba'i ched du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde'i man ngag/ slob dpon po d+hi sa rbas mdzad pa// 
322a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i gzungs bklag pa'i cho ga mdo sde las bsdus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo// cho ga byed par 'dod pas

322a5(rgyud 'grel): phan yod la yid ches shing dad pa dang gus pa bskyed/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom/ khyim pa yin na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims gzung / dus bzang po ches brgyad lta bu la ba tsam/ gnas yid du 'ong ba 
322a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsam mar byas la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mang pos legs par brgyan pa'i nang du spos kyi maN+Dal chen po byas la/ tshon phye 'am me tog gis dgram par bya'o// lugs sku'am ras bris 
322a7(rgyud 'grel): sum 'jam pa las byas pa yang rung ste/ rang bsal dang bcas pab+hA/ 'khor 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ga na yang bsham/ mchod pa ci 'byong ba yang bags ste/ 
322a8(rgyud 'grel): gzugs re re'i spyan sngar mar me bdun bdun dang / tshon swa lnga ba'i ba dan bdun bdun bzhag gzhan yang spos dang / me tog dang / dri dang / lha bshos dang / rol mo'i bye brag dang

345b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang gang gi phyir/ khyed de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dran la sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so// zhes rjes su gnang ba ston pa de bzhin du/ 
345b5(rgyud 'grel): deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir dul zhing zhi ba'i 'khor dang ldan par byams pa dang thugs brtse bas mchod pa bzhes shing mdo sde'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskang ste/ phan yon dza/ 
345b6(rgyud 'grel): ska bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis thob par byin gyis brlab par cig nang / lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par byas pa'i mdol sogs 
345b7(rgyud 'grel): pa gsung rab dam pa'i chos yun ring du rgyas par bgyi ba dang / sgo thams cad nas chos spyod pa rnams la bar chad dang bgegs su gyur pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs thams cad dang / yul phyogasu mi nad dang phyugs nad gtong 
346a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs tha dad pa mang ga khams dang yul phyogs 'dir chub mchis so 'tshal dang / chag mo la sngon gyi las kyis gdas pa 'am/ 'phral gyi ldan las gyur pa 'am/ yul phyogs dang mtshan dang / 
346a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ge mo'i lus dang srog dang chu srid dang dbang phyug dang / 'khor dang yo byad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la ci yang rung ba'i sgo nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs ci 
346a3(rgyud 'grel): mchis pa thams cad gang la yang gdul ba'i thabs kyis 'dul zhing / kho na dang gnod pa'i bsam pa 'dor du stsal te/ zhi ba dang dge ba dang byams pa'i bsam pa can du bgyid cing / sngan chad bkra mi shis pa dang / 
346a4(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa bgyis pa rnams kyang 'jig cing 'dor du sul/ slan chad kyang gnod pa'i bag ci yang mi bgyid par so so'i rigs kyi bro dam pos bsgag cing gdan 'jom pa'i spyan sngar dam tshig chen 
346a5(rgyud 'grel): po stsal ba'i phrin las mdzad pa ci gnang / re re nas mchod pa dbul zhing smon lam gdab rdzogs pa'i skabs 'dir/ gzungs sngags bzlas la khrus bya/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyir mchod pa ci 'byor

346a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de/ phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam
346a8(rgyud 'grel): gyi khyad par can dang mthun par smon lam btab pa dang / de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang dge ba la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis
346b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stobs dang / de dag gi mthu pal dang byin brlabs kyi stobs kyis che ge mo la sogs pa'i nal snga nas/ thog ma ma mches pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa mnga' ba thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ stsal 
346b2(rgyud 'grel): bsnyun mi mnga' zhing sku tshe ring ba dang / dbu rmog brtsan pa dang / chab srid 'byam dar che ba dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' ba rnyes par gyur cig/ mthar yang tshogs gnyis yongs su

346b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob par gyur cig/ yul khams thams cad du yang mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / lo nyes dang / dgra'i gnod pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i bag ci yang mi 'gyur ba dang / char chu

346b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi zhal mthong ste gdams ngag thob nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ khyad par du yang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sgo thams cad nas dang zhing rgyas 
346b7(rgyud 'grel): par gyur cig/ de nas bzod par gsol zhing gshegs su gsol ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun 'khor dang bcas pa dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das
346b8(rgyud 'grel): dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma dag pas ma 
347a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal ba dang / bag ma mchis pa'i dbang gis lus ngag yid gsum gyi spyod pa nyon mongs pa dang 'dres pa dang / mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan pa dang / gtsang sbras ma phyed pa dang / mdo las 'byung ba'i tshe/ 
347a2(rgyud 'grel): ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa 'khrul cing nongs pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzod pa bzhes shing 'phral dang yun du bdag cag gi sgrib
347a3(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur ba byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / de nas gshegs sa gsol ba ni/ khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 
347a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes byon par mdzod// mgon po thugs rjes chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis bdag cag dang sems can gyi don mdzad pa lags kyis/ so so'i zhing khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol

347b1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// byad ni dang bzhin yangs dag par// sad sogs nyes pa ma mnga' yang // yan bdag sgribs pa srung ldad dra// gzang ma'i chu yos su thas gsal// nas

347b5(rgyud 'grel): sel sngan mchog bdud rtsi ni// smon lam chen pos grub par gyur pa yi// bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal lo// las dang nyon mongs dbang gis sdug bsngal sa

380b7(rgyud 'grel): papal yang bzlas brjod gnyis sam gsum byas nas bdug go// mkha' 'gro mas zin pa la yungs kar da dgu gul gyi bdug pa la de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas pas bdug par bya'o// yang ni sred pa la swa 
380b8(rgyud 'grel): ma de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas nas mgul du gdags te/ de lta bu ni byis pa gso ba'i cho ga yin no// de bzhin du bud med bu thogs pa la tshul bzlas brjod lnga'am drug byas nas blu na legs par btsa' 
381a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bud med mo gsham la rje btsun sangs rgyas kyi sku bsil ba'i chu la bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ khrus byas pas lus gtsang mar gyur pa la blud na bu tsha 'byung zhing phan 
381a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni rigs rgyud spel ba'i cho ga yin no// lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis skud pa la bzlas brjod lan bdun byas nas re re zhing mdud pa dor bar bya'o// yang na gos kyi mtha' la lan gnyis 
381a3(rgyud 'grel): sam gsum bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa bong na bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni lam du nyes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshig yin no// shu dag chen gad tsam lo gcig gnyi ma'i grangs dang mnyam pa 
381a4(rgyud 'grel): blangs nas grangs de tsam du bzlas brjod byas la/ mar yang srang de tsam zhig la bzlas brjod byas nas bum pa gcig tu blugs te dkrugs nas nyi ma re re zhing shu dag gi dum bu dang mar srang gcig 
381a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod byas nas zos na yid gzhungs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang ma dang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas pa'i 'o thug snga ma'i mgo lcogs kyis dkrugs te zos na yid gzhungs pa'i 
381a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni yid gzhungs pa'i cho ga yin no// de bzhin du me tog dang 'bras bu'am tshwa 'am shing ngam 'jim pa lag pa g.yas pa'i chang par bzhug la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig char par bcug pa byin pa de dang 'dza' 
381a7(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ro// de ni mdza' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga yin no// de bzhin du ba lang dang rta la sogs pa phyugs 'chi bar nye bar gnas pa'i tshe chu yungs kar dang bcas pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i thum po gdags so// de bzhin du mi rnams
381a8(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba'i gnod pa 'byung ba la yungs kar la de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas pa'i zlum po mgo skyob kyi thog tu gdags par bya ste// 'di lta bu ni re zhig mings dang phyugs ngas gso ba'i tshi ga yin no// de zhig ne ban pa Di tra bdag gis 
381b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma las tshigs su bcad pa mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyor ba brgya thos so// de yang yun rings pas kha cig ni brjed de che long kun bsdus pa yin no// 'di thams cad

381b4(rgyud 'grel): nas bshud pa yin// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo// mkhan po ner ba na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/

381b7(rgyud 'grel): b.rab tu gnas pa byed pas gang rab tu gnas par bya ba mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i de'i nye 'khor cig sbyang nul byas te/ mthar tsan dan la sogs pa dri zhim po'i chus byugs nas

382a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa char bdun du bris la/ tshar re re zhing lan bdun bdun bklags te/ bum pa'i chus bkras la bum pa de nyid du gzhug par bya'o// de nas bum pa'i steng du zla ba la sngags kyi phreng
